courses.description:
Crea tu Libro de Autor para Arquitectos e Interioristas
Diseña, Maqueta y Publica  tu Propio Libro de Autor con tus Diseños, Obras y Proyectos de Arquitectura e Interiorismo
Instructores: Arq. Álvaro García y Arq. Lucía Fernández. Actualizado: Septiembre del 2025 Estudiantes: +3.100 Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Descripción del Curso:
Convierte tu portafolio en un Libro de Autor que eleve tu marca en arquitectura e interiorismo. Aprenderás a seleccionar y narrar proyectos, ordenar capítulos y diseñar con retícula editorial, tipografía profesional y control de color e imagen. Domina maquetación y diseño de portada/lomo, tratamiento de planos, renders y fotografías, y genera archivos listos para impresión (PDF/X, CMYK, sangrados) y edición digital.
Impartido en Udemy y pensado para todas las edades y niveles, este curso te guía paso a paso con plantillas, checklists y mockups para presentar tu obra con acabado premium. Verás opciones de autoedición y distribución, nociones de ISBN/derechos, y un mini plan de marketing para posicionar tu libro. Terminarás con un dossier/publicación lista para imprimir o publicar online, capaz de abrir puertas con clientes, editoriales y concursos.
Somos Álvaro García y Lucía Fernández, arquitectos desde hace más de 15 años. Hemos realizando obras, proyectos y reformas de interior y queremos compartir contigo esta formación donde podrás hacer una auto publicación o edición de tu libro de autor, que consiste en la publicación de tu libro porfolio con tus proyectos de arquitectura, interiorismo y creatividad sin la intervención de un editor. Verás que algunas de estas plataformas de auto publicación son auténticas librerías digitales que proporcionan a los autores los mecanismos para la edición, la venta y la promoción.
Tras este curso tendrás los conocimientos para elaborar tu propio libro de autor que podrás tener en poco tiempo puede tener tu obra en sus manos, En esta formación aprenderás a crear y maquetar tu primer libro de tu obra, tu primer libro de autor. Te enseñaremos a maquetar, colocar planos, textos, el diseño de tu portada y el lomo de libro. Además de como imprimir tu Libro de Autor.
Las lecciones de este curso se centran en:
- Dar forma a tu Libro de Autor, considerando los distintos tipos de publicaciones y sus partes.
- Dar forma a la página: cómo establecer pliegos y crear la caja tipográfica.
- La elección de la tipografía y el trabajo de los textos: cómo organizar, jerarquizar y trabajar con párrafos.
- El diseño de la cubierta y otras partes exteriores de un libro.
- La automatización y mejora de procesos de edición y cierre del documento antes de enviarlo a imprenta.
Atrévete a adentrarte en la revolucionaria metodología del mundo editorial con el programa más potente en maquetación.
Adobe InDesign es una aplicación profesional de maquetación de páginas que ofrece un control absoluto sobre diseño y tipografía. En este curso fundamental te enseñaremos las técnicas, los trucos y consejos que necesitas para comenzar a diagramar y diseñar páginas con esta potente aplicación.
Adobe InDesign es un software diseñado por Adobe, utilizado para el diseño de documentos y paginar, periódicos, revistas, libros y cualquier material de publicación que se nos ocurra.


Itinerario Formativo:
Introducción a la Plataforma Udemy
Bienvenida al curso  La Creación del Libro Creativo para Arquitectos e Interioristas
Crea Tu Libro Impreso de Autor Creativo
Preparamos Nuestro Libro para Mandarlo a La Imprenta
Recursos para el Alumno del curso "Crea tu Libro de Autor para Arquitectos e Interioristas"
Emisión del Certificado de Finalización del Curso "Crea tu Libro de Autor para Arquitectos e Interioristas"


Objetivos del curso:
Diseñar, maquetar y publicar un Libro de Autor de arquitectura e interiorismo con acabado profesional: selección y narrativa de proyectos, estructura por capítulos, retícula editorial, tipografía y gestión de color. Crearás portada/lomo/contraportada, integrarás renders, planos y fotografía, y generarás archivos listos para imprenta (PDF/X, CMYK, sangrados) y versión digital, con checklist de preflight y estilo visual coherente.


Salidas profesionales:
Potencia tu marca personal con una obra editorial que abre puertas en estudios, concursos, editoriales y clientes. Estarás preparado para autoedición (ISBN, derechos, print on demand, distribución), presentaciones y campañas de marketing; además, ganarás autoridad como arquitecto/interiorista al mostrar metodología, resultados y valor de tus proyectos en un formato premium.


Dirigido a:
Arquitectos, interioristas, estudiantes y creativos que desean transformar su portafolio en un libro profesional: desde principiantes hasta perfiles senior que buscan diferenciarse. Ideal para quienes necesitan una guía clara, con plantillas, mockups y checklists, para publicar un Libro de Autor convincente y listo para imprimir o distribuir online.


Metodología de Aprendizaje:
Recuerda que este curso incluye lecciones en vídeo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artículos didácticos, actividades, animaciones, ilustraciones, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interés, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalización, tutorización online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicación del curso.
La modalidad de este curso te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tú quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase según tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos... Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al máximo la formación, pero también puedes decidir ver este curso como una guía de referencia.
Las clases están claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten más importantes según tus necesidades formativas. La mayoría de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lección sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para seguir el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El curso está orientado a aquellos creativos que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer múltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano de los instructores Álvaro García y Lucía Fernández. Además la formación disponen de acceso automático al contenido, sin limitación de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al día los 7 días de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantía de devolución.
Con esta formación disfrutarás aprendiendo desde dónde quieras, sin tener que desplazarte, sin horarios, con quién quieras, según tus necesidades y disponibilidad. Aprenderás con un instructor avalado por miles da alumnos satisfechos en todo el mundo (comentarios certificados). Conocerás las técnicas, métodos, trucos y flujos de trabajo de este sector creativo. El docente te transmitirá su sabiduría y conocimientos con pasión a la vez que las explicaciones concisas, claras, sencillas y con un enfoque profesional en cada clase. Podrás conseguir un  certificado homologado personalizado y firmado por tu instructor en cada formación. De está forma podrás compartir tu título en tu portafolio, currículo, en redes sociales...
Con la alta definición de los vídeos (vídeo fullHD y audio de estudio) conseguirá no te perder detalle. Podrás ver las clases las veces que requieras para recordar y perfeccionar tus habilidades como diseñador. Tendrás la posibilidad de preguntar, pedir opinión y ayuda al instructor, además de compartir tu experiencia de aprendizaje con los demás alumnos del curso, tan apasionados como tú, repartidos por todo el mundo. Seleccionamos cuidadosamente los contenidos y producimos cada curso para garantizar una experiencia de aprendizaje online integral y de la máxima calidad.


¿A qué esperas?, este curso es ideal para ti, atrévete a convertirte en un experto y expresa tus ideas de la forma que siempre has deseado. Adelante, nos vemos dentro de la formación ;)
target_audience: Arquitectos e interioristas que quieren transformar su portafolio en un Libro de Autor profesional: selección de obras, narrativa y maquetación.
Estudiantes y recién graduados que buscan publicar su primer libro: retícula, tipografía, PDF/X, color y preparación para imprenta.

requirements: No Experience Needed. This Course Will Teach You Everything You Need to Know About Online Reputation Management So You Can Start Outranking Negative Links Today
courses.description:
In today's digital landscape, your online reputation can make or break your personal brand or business success. Whether you're an entrepreneur, marketing professional, or job seeker, mastering the art of online reputation management is essential. This comprehensive course is designed to equip you with the tools, techniques, and strategies needed to build, maintain, and protect your online image effectively.


Join us as we explore the fundamentals of online reputation management, including how search engines influence perceptions and the importance of social media engagement. You'll learn to leverage powerful monitoring tools to stay informed about what is being said about you or your brand across the internet, enabling you to respond promptly and effectively to any challenges that arise.


What can you expect from this course?


Practical Insights: Discover real-world case studies that illustrate both successes and failures in reputation management. We will analyze how different individuals and organizations have navigated reputation challenges, providing you with valuable lessons to apply to your own situation. These insights will help you avoid common pitfalls and implement proven strategies that yield results.
Hands-On Strategies: Gain actionable knowledge on using SEO (Search Engine Optimization), content creation, and social media to bolster your online presence. You will learn how to optimize your content for search engines, ensuring that positive information ranks higher and is more visible to your audience. This proactive approach not only enhances your reputation but also positions you as an authority in your field.
Crisis Management Techniques: In the digital age, a crisis can occur at any moment. Learn how to respond to reputational crises with confidence and professionalism. We will cover effective communication strategies that allow you to address negative feedback, manage public perception, and rebuild trust with your audience. Being prepared for a crisis is essential for protecting your brand and maintaining credibility.
Building a Positive Online Persona: We will delve into the importance of establishing a consistent and authentic online persona. You will learn how to craft compelling narratives that resonate with your audience, fostering emotional connections that strengthen your brand. By understanding the nuances of personal branding, you can enhance your credibility and make a lasting impression.
Continuous Improvement: Reputation management is not a one-time task; it requires ongoing effort and adaptation. Develop a long-term reputation management strategy that evolves with the digital landscape. Learn how to set measurable goals, assess your progress, and refine your strategies to ensure that your online presence remains positive and relevant over time.


By the end of this course, you will have a robust understanding of online reputation management and the skills necessary to create a positive online image that opens doors to new opportunities. You’ll walk away with practical tools you can implement immediately, empowering you to take control of your online narrative and enhance your personal or business brand.


Don’t leave your reputation to chance—enroll today and take the first step toward mastering your online presence! With expert guidance, engaging content, and a community of like-minded learners, you’ll be well-equipped to navigate the complexities of online reputation management and achieve your goals.
target_audience: Small Business Owners and Entrepreneurs: This group includes individuals who own or operate small businesses and are looking to establish and maintain a positive online reputation to attract and retain customers. They will benefit from learning how to effectively manage reviews, engage with customers on social media, and develop a proactive reputation management strategy.

Marketing and PR Professionals: Professionals working in marketing, public relations, or communications who want to enhance their skills in managing online reputations for themselves or their clients. This group will gain insights into monitoring tools, crisis management techniques, and strategies for leveraging positive content to build a brand's image.

Job Seekers and Professionals: Individuals seeking employment or career advancement who need to understand the importance of their online presence. This group will learn how to monitor their personal brand, respond to online feedback, and curate positive content that enhances their professional reputation in the job market.

courses.description:
In today’s fast-paced digital world, artificial intelligence is revolutionizing how brands are built, scaled, and managed. Brand Management with Generative AI is a practical, beginner-friendly course designed to help marketers, entrepreneurs, business owners, and creative professionals harness the power of AI to transform their branding strategies.
This course introduces you to cutting-edge tools like ChatGPT and various AI tools—showing you exactly how to use them to develop compelling brand narratives, create visual identities, generate content, and make data-driven branding decisions. Whether you’re launching a startup or managing a growing business, this course equips you with the skills to stay ahead in an AI-driven market.
You’ll learn how to:
Use AI to craft brand stories and positioning frameworks
Generate visuals and logos that align with your brand identity
Conduct faster market research and customer segmentation with AI tools
Create on-brand social media posts, blogs, and marketing content in minutes
Maintain brand authenticity while leveraging machine-generated creativity
This course combines strategic insights with hands-on demos, real-world case studies, and discussions around ethical AI use. You’ll also gain a clear understanding of AI’s limitations and how to complement it with human creativity to produce effective brand experiences.
By the end of the course, you'll be able to:
Build and manage a brand using AI tools effectively
Create consistent brand experiences across digital platforms
Stay agile and adapt your brand messaging to market trends
Enhance customer engagement through personalized, AI-generated content
Whether you're a beginner or a professional looking to upskill, this course gives you everything you need to thrive in the future of brand management.
See you in class.
Syed

Aprenderás cómo se crea la historia central de una marca a través del Storytelling.
Aprenderás los elementos básicos del storytelling para la creación de películas.

MODULO I: Diferencias entre la historia con propósito (Marketing) y la historia de ficción
MODULO II: Tipos de historias estratégicas que usan las grandes compañías en la publicidad.
El proceso de atención en los humanos y los clientes
Mitos y Misterios acerca del Storytelling
La Materia Prima para Crear Historias de Marca. Parte 1
La Materia Prima para Crear Historias de Marca. Parte 2
MODULO III: Contar historias y el guion de cine.
Los diferentes tipos de escenas con respecto a la escritura.

requirements: No requirement needed
courses.description:
En este Bey Atelier en Storytelling, aprenderás a dominar esta herramienta narrativa para crear historias de valor que puedan impulsar una estrategia de marketing a través de la publicidad, el copywriting, el branding y el liderazgo corporativo.
Este curso está basado en mi trabajo final de master de la Universidad Autónoma de Barcelona en donde llevó a cabo una investigación exhaustiva sobre el storytelling en el desarrollo de marcas, empresas y la publicidad.
Este curso esta dividido en 3 módulos que te permitirán conocer como funciona el storytelling para el marketing, publicidad, el desarrollo de marcas y la construcción de historias de ficción.
MÓDULO I
En el primer modulo aprenderás los fundamentos del storytelling para que paso a paso puedas entender las reglas que te llevarán a conectar con las audiencias y clientes de manera asertiva y en influir en sus acciones. Ademas, aprenderás lo importante que es el storytelling para el marketing, entendiendo como la emoción y la persuasión son elementos directamente conectado a las historias.
MÓDULO II
En el segundo modulo aprenderás los diferentes tipos de historias estratégicas que utilizan las grandes marcas en la publicidad. Adicionalmente que es lo que impulsa la intención de compra en los clientes. Conocerás como se crea la historia central de una marca a través del storytelling.
El proceso de atención humano es fundamental para entender las historias y lo conocerás en este módulo para que sepas como las audiencias leen nuestras historias.
Aprenderás acerca del storytelling y el aprendizaje para que sepas como esta estrategia narrativa le permite a los estudiantes capturar y entender una mayor cantidad de contenidos complejos. Además, sabrás cuales son los mitos que existen acerca del storytelling para que no lo utilices de manera errada en tus estrategias de marketing.
MÓDULO III
Finalmente en el tercer modulo aprenderás los elementos básicos del storytelling para la creación audivisual Estas son lecciones extra de mi cursos de dirección de cine y guion de cine para que entiendas como partir de una idea a un guion de cine. Un modulo donde aprenderás sobre la estructura clasica de 3 actos, los conceptos Tagline y logline, semiotica y cuales son los diferentes tipos de escenas en relación con la escritura.


"Si quieres aprender a conectar con las audiencias en largo termino debes aprender a contar historias"


Baudilio
target_audience: Este curso está diseñado para profesionales creativos que quieran construir las mejores historias para desarrollar estrategias de marketing que impulsen marcas y compañías.
Compañías de marketing

courses.title: How to Sell Your Book Before You Write It
courses.bio: How to earn royalties from your book idea TODAY — no need to wait until it's published (or even written)

Sales from Your Current Audience: Add as a Cross-Sell or Up-Sell
Sales from A New Audience: Cold Messaging Your Ideal Target Reader
Tips to Make Your Offer Enticing

requirements: No writing, coding, or marketing experience required
courses.description:
Have a great book idea but don't have the up-front funds to invest in its creation?


You're not alone. One survey found that 81% of people say they want to write a book, yet only 8% of those who said Yes ever followed through.


That's why we created our newest course, "How to Sell Your Book Before You Write the First Word."


This course was designed to help you learn how to pre-sell your book before you even start writing it, and use the revenue to fund the writing process.


In this course, we'll walk you through the step-by-step process of creating the necessary assets to pre-sell your book, including building an email list, creating a landing page, and developing a sales pitch. We'll also share tips on how to validate your book idea and make sure there's a market for it.


You'll learn how to leverage the power of social media to create buzz around your book and build a community of followers who are excited about your book. We'll show you how to entice your current audience, attract a new one, and increase your pre-sales.


By the end of this course, you'll have the tools and knowledge you need to pre-sell your book and fund the writing process. You'll also have a solid understanding of how to build a community around your book and generate buzz before it's even published.


Don't let a lack of resources or uncertainty about your book's marketability hold you back. Enroll in "How to Sell Your Book Before You Write the First Word" today and take the first step toward becoming a successful author!
target_audience: Aspiring authors who want to see a return on investment BEFORE they put in the time and work to create their book

Very unique is that we update our course every couple of weeks, and host online workshops, so the value of the course grows exponentially for users who stay longer.


--Certification for people who finish this course included--
--Coming from a 2x award winning team working with clients from Silicon Valley to Amsterdam--


Do you believe in making a real positive impact on people?
In this branding course, we reveal all the behind-the-scenes principles of our branding and social media marketing teams, and how that lead to multi-million-pound deals including real live interviews from Global leaders at Google, Reddit, to several YouTubers with millions of subscribers starting new channels, and many more... .
This course will focus on a great fundamentals overview of how to start your branding journey, in such a way that you save money once you start scaling. Premium principles will be covered in detail to ensure quality and consistency in your brand no matter the stage. We will include case studies and step by step walkthroughs so you can start with confidence as a branding expert.


Do you want access to a world-class team of people who are grinding every day in growth hacking and performance marketing?
In this course, our focus is on you. We are daily practitioners giving you answers when you ask them in the QnA. Making sure you get the most cutting-edge advice out there.


Are we the real deal?


Please check out the video testimonials from our executive clients who run 7+ figure businesses.  And previews of speeches we were invited to speak, like Google Startupgrind.


These principles we're about to teach you are based on our very own blueprint and have been featured on TEDx, Google StartupGrind, and many more...
Outside of using these principles to help others, we also use them daily on our own team of over 50+ people, and they have been proven to work under the most extreme cases with people dealing from small startup teams to large corporates who have dealt with all the struggles you can have in advertising and marketing.


If you've ever struggled with people "not getting" what you stand for, or knowing how to set up your business branding basics to boost your website and socials. Then you'll definitely love having access to our team.


We're practitioners, that's why we can provide real use cases, 24/7 support, and a certification from an organization that has delivered thousands of trainings to corporate organizations worldwide.


This specific ELITEx Branding course is approx. 20 hours and more heavily focused on getting you up and running. In this course, we will be focused on:
Fundamentals
Behind-the-scenes
How to set up your personal branding as well as your business branding as an entrepreneur.
Expert interviews (From YouTubers with 5 million + subscribers to Startup Entrepreneurs with 1 million + clients, as well as some surprise marketing champions and global corporates)
Even though it is smaller, it's still ongoing and will be updated monthly with new QnA videos until we've answered all your questions. You can request the next topic once inside the course. So make sure to stay engaged once inside.


...


THIS IS FOR PEOPLE WHO ARE INTERESTED IN:
Branding, Marketing, Social Media & Digital Marketing Training

Great step-by-step process and history to explain Branding better to beginners
DO NOT BUY THIS COURSE IF:
Only parts of this course may be relevant for you if you are a professional Chief Marketing Officer or doing 7 figure sales and up. For that, you'll need our more in-depth courses.
This course is heavily focused on attracting what you need to get started or improve your basic teachings. You need to be comfortable with advertising and putting yourself in the digital world with your brand to people on the internet to accomplish this.
Even if you are a beginner or advanced, our entire team is here to answer your questions, so if you have a unique situation, getting this course is a cheaper way to get access to us.




Extra 10+ hour Expert interviews included.
* And a ton of extras, QnA's, Free update videos, More content, more expert interviews ...




A BRAND NEW WAY TO DO IMPACTFUL BRANDING!
Do you also find it extremely difficult to focus and stay in the moment – where you are actually succeeding at great branding?
For the first time ever, as ELITEx, we’re launching the ultimate online digital marketing training.
We’ll be teaching you how we came up with our teachings through countless interactions with our clients from all over the world, from Silicon Valley to Amsterdam, and how we scaled it within our organization of over 50+ people. The best thing is that you can have zero experience starting out and we'll be able to guide you through the essential strategies of sales.


IS THIS PERFECT FOR YOU?
This is perfect for you if you’re a business owner, freelancer, or student that is looking to create a career path and wants to learn proven marketing strategies and practices... Whether you're a beginner or seasoned marketing expert we'll cover the basics of marketing in this course.


Our practices have been featured in small rooms as well as in front of global audiences with thousands of people at our events.


GET READY!
If you ever wondered how to start your marketing career or explain certain practices to your team… but the only thing stopping you is the experience or lack of resources, then this course will be worth it to you.

...
We’ll be walking you step by step through the following:
FUNDAMENTALS OF BRANDING & STRATEGIES ON A GLOBAL SCALE
Learn how to set up your branding consistent for each platform, start and automate the branding process even as you start scaling to multi million revenue, and much more...


BRANDING IN THE DIGITAL AGE
The basics of how to adapt traditional methods in the digital age, and automate all your boring tasks. So that you can understand or teach others who are more practical and need the exact strategies to become successful.


+ MANY EXTRAS


...

LEARN
Our learning platform is updated monthly with new videos. If there is a certain topic you want to know about, please request this by asking us a question on the Udemy Platform. Our support and instructor team answers quickly.


Of course, the practical experience is half the work. That’s why we also invite you to our virtual job shadows, and any of our events, to really get practical with everything you learn. That's right, free access giveaways to our members to visit a live event.


CULTURE
We invest highly in the community culture, with live events, meetups, feedback Fridays, and collaborations. It is our everyday mission to create a creative, safe, and fun environment to thrive in.


...


ABOUT US
The ELITEx Program is a private online training community founded in 2018.
It’s the ultimate online school for impact creators, designed to teach you how to build and scale any skill that has the potential to bring good into the world and impact human lives, even if you have no idea where to start or you have no technical skills or knowledge.
Each year we have thousands of new people from all around the world enter our online training programs, and live events and I want to make sure that you can make an informed and educated decision on whether the ELITEx Program is right for you.

Warum solltest du den Kurs ausgerechnet von uns kaufen?
Cindy Pfitzmann ist Marketing- und Unternehmensberaterin mit Fokus auf Marketing, Digitalisierung und Prozessoptimierung. Zudem ist sie Gründerin und Herausgeberin des The Bold Woman Online Magazins, in dem sich Unternehmerinnen zeigen, vernetzen und sich zu den Themen Marketing und Personal Branding weiterbilden können.
Julia Lettinger ist die Gründerin der Responsive Strategy Academy, mit inzwischen über 70.000 Teilnehmern und Teilnehmerinnen auf der Udemy Plattform und leitet eine Managementberatung für Unternehmensstrategie in Berlin.
Julia Lettinger und Cindy Pfitzmann lehren an der Hochschule für Wirtschaft und Recht (HWR) Berlin seit 2018 den Kurs "Grundlagen des Strategisches Managements" im Rahmen eines Lehrauftrags.

Liebste Grüße
Cindy & Julia

courses.title: Learn Video Marketing for Business: How to Grow with Video
courses.bio: Get the know-how, tools and confidence to make great videos for your business, fast.
requirements: You know how to use a computer
courses.description:
Every day, I meet entrepreneurs, solopreneurs, and creators who want to make better videos, but don't know how to start.
I hear questions like, How do I look good on camera? Which camera should I use? How do I make a tutorial?
This course is all about answering those questions and more.
When you're running a business you don't have a lot of time to learn a brand new skill. Nor is it easy to carve out time every day for a new task: creating videos.
This short course (less than 2 hours) will give you know-how, tools, and confidence. My goal is to get you ready to film great content, every day.


What's in this course?
Why video: Find out how video helps your business grow.
Video types: Different video helps in different ways. We'll break this down.
Equipment: Stop your search. Get the gear recommendations you need here.
Studio setup: Learn how to set up your own recording space.
Software: Which software to use for each part of the video making process.
Process: A simple, time-saving process that'll help you churn out videos.
Recording: Step-by-step instructions for how to record great videos.
Editing: An easy editing guide to remove mistakes and add your own style.
Sharing: Storing, organising, and sharing your videos with the world.
target_audience: People who run digital biz: startup founders, solopreneurs, freelancers, small business owners, creators

courses.description:
こんにちは！

2000年から2016年までTESAGEをNYCからネット販売してきたマーケティング力を是非とも共有して欲しいというたくさんの皆様方のリクエストにお答えして、2011年よりこれから益々必要になるブランティング（Marketing3.0)をネット上で共有してきました。
皆さんの悩みは様々ですが、皆さんはもこんなことで頭を悩めていませんか？
・新規カスタマーがなかなか増えない・既存のお客様のリピートを増やしたい
・社内コミュニケーションがうまく出来ない
・ETSYなどハンドメイドのサイトで似たようなデザイナーさんと差をつけ売上をあげたい
・情報が多すぎてオンラインマーケティングをどこから始めていいのか分からない

・ソーシャルメディアマーケティングをする時間が限られている

そんな方は、限られた時間を使って、是非スマートフォンビデオ（動画)で上記の悩みを一緒に解決してゆきましょう！

せっかく習っても、実践しないことには前に進みません。毎週の課題をクリアーして、4週間でマスターしましょう。
アメリカでは、Video (動画)でストーリーを伝え、お客様を引き寄せる手法が年々加速しています。しかもプロっぽいコマーシャルではなく、コンスーマー(消費者自身)の声や、デザイナー自身の声で伝えるものが効果が大きいと言われています。

沢山の情報に囲まれた毎日で、新聞や本などを読む時間が限られている方は、ビデオで情報を得ている人が多いのではないでしょうか？300ページの本をじっくり読むと5－8時間ぐらいかかってしまいますが、その情報をビデオに収めると、写真、映像に加えナレーションを加えると10－15分で伝えられます。
アプリの登場で思いの他、簡単にビデオ製作ができます。
現に、わたしもTESAGEのクラウドファンディング用ビデオ製作の際にはインターンと一緒に107時間もかかって2分のナレーション付きビデオをつくりました。しかし、今はスマートフォンを使って、10時間で、出来るようになりました。
最近は撮りだめしておいた映像に１つ2つ新しい映像を追加して、2，3時間で作れてしまいます。
まずは、一緒にやってみましょう！新しい楽しい世界が見えてきますよ！
* このコースはジョン先生のセクションは日本語字幕で解説していますので、字幕を付けて受講ください。字幕のつけ方については各レクチャーの解説欄に記載されています。
target_audience: 今まで一度もビデオ編集をしたことがない方でも全く問題ありません。
スマホを使ってビデオ撮影をしたことはあるが、どう編集したらよいのか分からないという方。
ストーリーの構成方法が分からないので、ビデオ編集に戸惑ってしまっている方。

objectives: Hiểu được tầm quan trọng của storytelling (kể chuyện) trong marketing

Những lợi ích của storytelling trong marketing bất động sản
Vì sao các doanh nghiệp bất động sản nhỏ cần sử dụng storytelling sớm
Khoá học này dành cho ai?
Kiến thức cơ bản về Storytelling trong M: Định nghĩa và sự khác nhau của các loại câu chuyện (motif kể chuyện)

Tạo ra những câu chuyện khiên khách hàng mê đắm
Phát triển tư duy kể chuyện cho doanh nghiệp của bạn

Hiểu nhu cầu và mong muốn của khách hàng mục tiêu
Xây dựng chân dung khách hàng để kể chuyện
Những thành phần của một câu chuyện: Ví dụ kinh điển: Tây du ký & Mưu cầu hạnh phúc
Context - Xây dựng bối cảnh, hoàn cảnh câu chuyện
Conflict - Xây dựng chướng ngại vật, kiếp nạn
Resolution - Cách giải quyết / Kết thúc có hậu

Kết nối internet và không gian yên tĩnh
courses.description:
Đây là khoá học đầu tiên và duy nhất tại Việt Nam cho tới hiện tại tập trung vào việc giúp học viên xây dựng kỹ năng kể chuyện, nghệ thuật kể chuyện (storytelling) vào việc trong việc xây dựng các chiến lược marketing cho các công ty bất động sản nhỏ không có nhiều ngân sách. Một khi nắm vững kỹ năng này, chủ doanh nghiệp có thể ứng dụng vào không chỉ marketing, mà còn bán hàng, xây dựng thương hiệu, lãnh đạo, quản trị, giao tiếp, thuyết trình...
Khoá học sẽ đi từ những khái niệm cơ bản đến nâng cao, bao gồm phân tích các case study và cách ứng dụng các cách thức kể chuyện vào những tình huống cụ thể trong marketing, bán hàng.
Đặc biệt với những doanh nghiệp nhỏ, là các sàn bán hàng bất động sản, thì đây có thể xem là cứu cánh, là liều thuốc tiên để chữa nỗi đau: không có đủ ngân sách để làm thương hiệu và tạo ra khách hàng tiềm năng. Trong một môi trường kinh doanh cạnh tranh khốc liệt, việc xây dựng thương hiệu thành công sẽ giúp doanh nghiệp cạnh tranh hiệu quả và "bứt top". Nghệ thuật kể chuyện sẽ giúp các bạn làm được điều đó!
target_audience: Những chủ doanh nghiệp nhỏ là các công ty, sàn bán hàng bất động sản đang tìm đường hướng làm marketing
Những chủ doanh nghiệp nhỏ không có nhiều ngân sách làm marketing muốn có cách sáng tạo
Cấp quản lý phòng marketing, chịu trách nhiệm xây dựng chiến lược marketing
Những người say mê nghiên cứu marketing và nghệ thuật kể chuyện

objectives: Learn how to craft compelling brand stories that connect with audiences and drive engagement.

requirements: No prior experience in branding or AI required—perfect for beginners and professionals alike.

courses.description:
Unlock the power of storytelling and AI to build a brand that truly connects.
Whether you're a freelancer, small business owner, content creator, or marketing professional, this course will teach you how to use ChatGPT and storytelling strategies to craft a memorable, authentic brand identity.
We’ll start with the foundations of brand storytelling—what it is, why it matters, and how it influences customer decisions. From there, we’ll explore how to work with ChatGPT as a creative partner, not just a tool. By the end of this course, you'll know how to build your brand story, adapt it across platforms, and even use it to connect with your audience on a deeper level.
This course is designed to help you move beyond generic branding advice and create something that reflects who you really are—and who you're trying to reach.
What you’ll learn:
Understand the core elements of a powerful brand story
Use ChatGPT effectively to brainstorm, refine, and write your content
Define your brand’s voice, tone, values, and personality
Write compelling customer testimonials and origin stories
Adapt your story across platforms like Instagram, blogs, YouTube, and email
Keep your brand message consistent, even when using AI
Learn how to measure success and adjust your content strategy
No prior experience with AI is required—just bring your ideas, your story, and your willingness to explore.
By the end of the course, you’ll walk away with a fully developed brand story and the confidence to share it with the world. You'll also gain tools, worksheets, and prompts to help you continue refining your message long after the final lecture.
target_audience: Freelance marketers, copywriters, and social media managers looking to expand their brand storytelling skills.
Entrepreneurs, small business owners, and solopreneurs who want to craft a powerful brand identity.
Graphic designers and branding consultants who want to use AI for storytelling and marketing content.
Aspiring content creators, influencers, and AI enthusiasts who want to use ChatGPT for brand messaging.

courses.title: Brand Management and Marketing Strategy
courses.bio: The fundamentals of building strong B2C brands
objectives: Learn Sales ,Trade Marketing and Distribution system of consumer goods
Introduction to Consumer research and Media planning
Learn to how to write a brand concept and develop a brand positioning
Learn how to create engaging communication based on consumer insights
Learn to decode ads and understand the marketing strategy behind it.
Learn the process of developing consumer tested video communication
Learn to evaluate advertising options as a brand manager
Learn how to select the right media vehicle for your brand communication
Learn Brand health evaluation techniques and corresponding actions
requirements: There is no experience needed. I would recommend that you check out my free course on Brand positioning and Marketing communication to get a sense of the kind pedagogy being deployed
courses.description:
This course covers the fundamentals of brand management and marketing strategy of consumer goods.

We start with the basics of sales and distribution of consumer goods. This is important to understand the overall industry and hence look at the role of a brand manager with that context.

We cover the key roles in marketing i.e Consumer research, Media planning and Brand Management.

We then look at how to create a brand positioning by writing a brand concept and using a positioning framework.

Once we've established the brand positioning we use the same to create brand communication.
We not only look at the process of creating brand communication but also what gets some brand to create consistently good communication while others struggle to do so.

We then learn how to evaluate a brand communication, internally as well as using consumer research.

We then move on to learn about the different media vehicles and their unique properties. This helps us answer which media vehicle would be better suited to our brand and message.

We wrap up the course with a look at how brand health is measured. Once we're able to identify the strength and weakness of our brand with consumers, we can take the learning and apply the techniques that we've learnt in the previous sessions.
target_audience: Students or aspirant to a marketing or brand management role
Sales professionals who aspire to be in a marketing role
Sales professionals who intend to understand the marketing system better

في الكورس ده، أنا مش هعلمك لينكدإن من الناحية التقنية بس… أنا هفتحلك الصندوق الأسود!
هشاركك رحلتي الكاملة: إزاي بدأت من صفر متابع، ووصلت لأكتر من 100 ألف متابع حقيقي، ومش بس كده… قدرت أحوّل الانتشار ده لفرص، شغل، شراكات، ومبيعات حقيقية على أرض الواقع.
هتفهم إزاي بيشتغل خوارزم لينكدإن فعلًا، وازاي أول 3 ساعات بعد ما تنشر بوست هما اللي بيحددوا مصيره.
هتتعلم تكتب محتوى حقيقي وجذاب، مش مجرد كلام محفوظ.
وهتكتشف أسرار بناء علاقات على لينكدإن توصلّك لجمهورك المثالي، وتخلي الناس هي اللي تدور عليك وتتفاعل معاك بشكل طبيعي ومستمر.
كمان هتتعلم ازاي تحلل أداء البوستات وتعرف إيه اللي نجح وإيه اللي محتاج تعديل، وده اللي هيخليك تطور باستمرار وتبني حضور قوي ومستقر.
لو أنت فريلانسر، أو صاحب بيزنس، أو موظف حابب الناس تشوف شغلك ومكانتك، الكورس ده معمول ليك.
ومفيش أي خبرة مطلوبة… بس محتاج تبقى جاهز تطبق وتكسر الحاجز النفسي، وتبدأ الرحلة.
في نهاية الكورس، هتكون بنيت خطة محتوى كاملة لشهر، وفهمت ازاي تمشي على طريق الانتشار بثقة واستمرارية.
ده مش كورس معلومات… ده كورس تطبيق وانتشار فعلي بخطوات واضحة ومجربة.
target_audience: فريلانسر عايز يجيب شغل

objectives: How to apply proven strategic frameworks like Aaker’s Brand Vision and Dunford’s Positioning Canvas

requirements: No formal prerequisites required. This course is designed for marketers, strategists, creatives, and intellectually curious professionals at all levels.
courses.description:
What This Course Is Really About
If you’re tired of marketing courses filled with jargon, hype, or slide-deck theater, this course is different. It goes beyond surface-level tactics. This course equips you to challenge assumptions, unlearn outdated models, and apply frameworks that are grounded in marketing science—not trend-chasing.
I’m Ventseslav Hikov, Chief Strategy Officer at BBDO and a long-time advocate for clarity over chaos in brand-building. With 30+ years in advertising strategy—and experience leading brand strategy for Snickers, Heineken, Volvo, Pepsi, and more—I bring battle-tested lessons from the real world. Not just slides.
This course is not about chasing the latest trend. It’s about unlearning the fluff and rediscovering the fundamentals that actually grow brands—through real strategy, creative thinking, and evidence-based insight.
This is the course for curious marketers who are done with the hacks and hype.
What’s Inside the Course?
Through real-world examples, simple exercises, and practical frameworks, you’ll apply what you learn right away—even if you're not building a brand from scratch.
Module Highlights:
Module 1: Foundations of Modern Branding
→ What branding is (and isn’t), emotional drivers, trust, and loyalty
Module 2: Building a Brand Identity That Lasts
→ Using Aaker’s framework to create a full, flexible identity
Module 3: Brand Positioning & Competitive Strategy
→ Learn to stand out with meaningful differentiation, not just noise
Module 4: Driving Brand Growth
→ Kantar’s blueprint: how brands grow with meaningful difference
Module 5: The Five Disciplines of Brand-Building
→ Marty Neumeier’s model: Differentiate, Collaborate, Innovate, Validate, Cultivate
Module 6: Integrating Brand & Performance
→ Get the balance right: brand vs. performance, long vs. short
Module 7: Measuring and Implementing Strategy
→ From scorecards to strategy adjustments: build a brand that grows
My Teaching Style
Think of this as a bullshit-free zone for marketers.
I teach with:
Real-world examples, not recycled theory
Strategic frameworks, not generic templates
Humor, clarity, and the occasional friendly rant
If you’re here to explore, challenge your assumptions, and walk away smarter—you’re in the right place.
Who This Course Isn’t For
If you're looking for quick hacks, trendy acronyms, or endless tactics without strategy—this probably isn’t your course. But if you’re ready to learn how real brands grow, let’s get started.
Enroll Today
Enroll today to rethink what brand strategy really means—and start building brands that last.
Already trusted by global brands and built with business relevance in mind, this course is a perfect fit for teams and professionals seeking a smarter approach to brand-building.
target_audience: Marketers who want to understand what makes brands work (and last)
Brand managers and strategists looking for real frameworks, not fluff
Entrepreneurs and business owners tired of shiny tactics that don’t deliver
Students of marketing who believe learning is a lifelong journey

requirements: マーケティングの経験者である必要はありません。
courses.description:
ブランドを大きく成長させる戦略や施策を作りたい。でも、これまでのやり方だと難しい気がする。売上を持続的に成長させたい。でも、小手先のマーケティングでは、継続的な成長は得られない。根本的で本質的なマーケティングのフレームワークがあれば、ブランドを持続的に成長させる仕組みとして導入したいのに…とお考えの方に。
このコースでは、P&Gで20年近くマーケティングを実践し、さらにはM-Force株式会社代表取締役として様々な企業を支援してきた講師が、P&G出身者が数々の経験から開発した独自メソッド「9segs」に基づき、本質的かつ実践的なマーケティングを解説します。
このコースでは、顧客起点マーケティングの基本的な考え方から、顧客理解・顧客戦略づくり・施策づくり・効果測定というPDCAの一連の流れを解説します。また、理論だけではなく、具体的な実践方法なども例を交えつつ紹介していくので、マーケティングの初心者から経験者まで、そして、プロダクト開発・広告開発・販促開発・CRM開発などあらゆる施策の担当者に対しても、気づきと学びを提供します。
target_audience: 事業プランニング・プロダクト開発・プロモーション企画をされる方向け。
今のマーケティングアプローチ以外の方法を探している方
再現性のある、体系立てたマーケティングアプローチを探している方

requirements: How to search Google
courses.description:
Nowadays everyone googles everyone: friends, relatives, recruiters, hiring managers, and even strangers may be searching for you on the web.
Consumers will take the time to research a brand before ever doing business with them. Employers google job candidates before even inviting them to an interview. People look through search results and social media profiles before ever agreeing to a first date.
Whatever you see in Google when you type your name is crucial for your professional and personal life. Whatever people see searching your business is its most important success or failure factor.
Your online reputation can define your future as well the future of your business...
Not paying attention means missing out on great opportunities (which is the base case scenario), and sometimes even setting yourself up for failure.
This course will provide you with the most actionable plan on managing your online reputation: From explaining basic steps, to providing free tools and PDF cheatsheets. It's perfect for startup CEOs, (small) business managers, authors, etc.
Included in the course you will find:
9 actionable lectures showing you the steps and tools to manage your online reputation
A free downloadable PDF eBook to download and take home (or hand to your ) including all the discussed steps
A free audio book with most important takeaways to listen to when on a trip or away from the Internet connection

courses.description:
¡Te damos la bienvenida a nuestro fascinante curso "Aprende a Crear un Podcast en 5 Pasos"! Aquí, te sumergirás en el emocionante universo del podcasting mientras te guiamos a través de un proceso claro y efectivo para convertir tus ideas en episodios cautivadores. Desde la fase inicial de planificación y grabación hasta la edición y publicación, este curso te proporcionará las habilidades esenciales necesarias para lanzar tu propio podcast con confianza.
No solo nos enfocaremos en los fundamentos del podcast, sino que también exploraremos técnicas avanzadas para destacar en el vasto paisaje auditivo. Cada módulo se adentrará en estrategias probadas, desde la creación de una narrativa convincente hasta el uso efectivo de la música y el sonido. Obtendrás una comprensión profunda de las plataformas de alojamiento y promoción, maximizando así la visibilidad de tus episodios.
Además, recibirás asesoramiento personalizado para enfrentar desafíos comunes y mejorar constantemente tu contenido. Prepárate para iniciar un viaje que no solo perfeccionará tus habilidades técnicas, sino que también te empoderará para compartir tu voz única con el mundo y construir conexiones auténticas a través del podcast. Tu emocionante trayectoria hacia el éxito auditivo comienza aquí. ¡Bienvenido al futuro del podcast!
Te deseamos el mejor de los éxitos
target_audience: Este curso está diseñado para personas de diversas experiencias y habilidades, con un interés común en ingresar al fascinante mundo del podcasting. Está dirigido a:  Principiantes en Podcasting: Si eres nuevo en la creación de podcasts y deseas entender desde cero cómo empezar, este curso te proporcionará las bases esenciales.  Entusiastas de la Tecnología: Si disfrutas utilizando computadoras y dispositivos móviles, y estás interesado en aprender a utilizar herramientas digitales para contar historias a través del podcasting, este curso es para ti.  Creadores de Contenido Aspirantes: Si tienes un deseo de expresar tus ideas, contar historias o compartir tu conocimiento, este curso te guiará en el proceso de convertir tus ideas en contenido de calidad para un podcast.  Profesionales del Marketing y Medios Digitales: Si trabajas en marketing o medios digitales y deseas expandir tus habilidades para incluir la creación de podcasts como parte de tu estrategia, este curso te proporcionará los conocimientos necesarios.  Curiosos y Creativos: Si eres una persona curiosa, creativa y dispuesta a experimentar con nuevas formas de comunicación, el podcasting es un medio emocionante y este curso te brindará las herramientas para explorarlo.  Este curso es accesible para cualquier persona con el deseo de aprender a crear y lanzar su propio podcast, independientemente de su nivel de experiencia previa en podcasting o habilidades técnicas. ¡Únete y descubre el emocionante mundo del podcasting en solo 5 pasos!

courses.description:
التسويق الشخصي المربح المريح: استكشف ذاتك أولًا ثم انطلق لتحقيق أحلامك
هل تشعر بأنك تملك الكثير لتقدمه للعالم، لكنك تواجه صعوبة في تسويق نفسك بفعالية لتحقيق النجاح الذي تستحقه؟ هل تبحث عن طريقة لبناء علامة تجارية شخصية قوية ومؤثرة تجذب الفرص وتحقق لك الرضا المادي والشخصي دون إرهاق؟
دورة "التسويق الشخصي المربح المريح" مع خبير التسويق عدي حاتم هي بوابتك لتحويل شغفك ومهاراتك إلى قيمة حقيقية يطلبها السوق. هذه الدورة ليست مجرد دروس نظرية، بل هي رحلة عملية وعميقة تبدأ من داخلك لتكتشف قدراتك الفريدة، وتنتهي بك وأنت تملك استراتيجية تسويق شخصي فعالة ومريحة تحقق لك أهدافك وطموحاتك.
لماذا هذه الدورة مختلفة؟
نحن نؤمن بأن التسويق الشخصي الناجح يبدأ من الاستكشاف الذاتي. قبل أن تنطلق في رحلة التسويق الخارجي، ستساعدك هذه الدورة على:
تحديد قيمك الأساسية وشغفك الحقيقي.
اكتشاف نقاط قوتك الفريدة ومهاراتك المميزة التي تميزك عن الآخرين.
فهم جمهورك المستهدف واحتياجاته، لتتمكن من تقديم الحلول التي يبحثون عنها.
صياغة رسالتك التسويقية الشخصية بوضوح وإقناع.
بعد هذا الاستكشاف العميق لذاتك، ستتعلم كيف تنطلق بثقة في عالم التسويق الشخصي، وذلك من خلال:
بناء علامتك التجارية الشخصية من الصفر أو تعزيزها إن كانت موجودة.
استخدام أدوات التسويق الرقمي بذكاء وفعالية (مثل لينكد إن، ووسائل التواصل الاجتماعي، والمحتوى الشخصي) لتصل إلى جمهورك المستهدف.
فهم كيفية تسعير خدماتك أو منتجاتك بطريقة مربحة ومناسبة لقيمتك.
بناء شبكة علاقات احترافية قوية تدعم مسيرتك وتفتح لك أبواب الفرص.
التعامل مع التحديات التسويقية وكيفية الحفاظ على استمرارية النجاح دون الوقوع في فخ الإرهاق.
مع عدي حاتم، ستتعلم كيف يكون التسويق الشخصي مربحًا، أي يحقق لك العائد المادي الذي تطمح إليه، ومريحًا، بمعنى أنه يتوافق مع شخصيتك وقيمك ولا يشعرك بالإرهاق أو التصنع. ستخرج من هذه الدورة مزودًا بالخطوات العملية والأدوات اللازمة ليس فقط لتسويق نفسك ببراعة، بل لتحقيق أحلامك المهنية والشخصية بطريقة مستدامة وممتعة. انضم إلينا الآن وابدأ رحلتك نحو التميز!
target_audience: أصحاب المهارة الواحدة الراغبين في استغلالها للتسويق الشخصي
أصحاب المهارات المتعددة الراغبين في استكشاف أي المهارات تساعدهم في تحقيق الربح والراحة أثناء التسويق الشخصي

courses.title: Mastering Brand Management: Foundations to Global Strategies
courses.bio: Gain the skills to build, manage, and elevate brands, from understanding consumer behavior to mastering online branding
objectives: Students will gain a comprehensive understanding of brand management, from foundational concepts to advanced brand equity measurement.
They'll explore how to create, position, and manage brands effectively within various industries and digital landscapes.
The course covers essential topics, such as brand building and challenges, brand equity, consumer buying behavior, marketing communications
Through case studies, practical exercises, and real-world examples, students will also learn to develop and execute strategic branding initiatives
Learn positioning brands for long-term success, and leveraging digital platforms for e-branding.
By the end of the course, students will be able to apply brand management principles confidently to drive brand value and customer loyalty.

Brand Management An Introduction: The Innovation Graph followed by companies
Brand Building and Brand Pitfalls Continues
Brand Challenges and Customer loyalty Pyramid
Creating a Brand: Strategic Fit of Brand identity and Brand Image
Organizational Culture for Successful Br: Cultural examples in the real world
Brand Equity Like Money in the Bank: Building Brand Equity elements and examples
Measuring Brand Equity Report Card: Qualitative methods of Brand Equity Continues
Quantitative methods of Brand Equity Continues with Examples and Case Studies
Consumer Behavior and Brand Buying Decis: Individual and Environmental determinants affecting human behaviour
Branding and Marketing Program: Understanding Product mix and Product Assortment
Branding and Marketing Communication: Further light on Promotional tools with examples

requirements: There are no strict prerequisites for this course, making it accessible to beginners as well as professionals interested in deepening their brand management knowledge. However, a basic understanding of marketing principles or prior experience in business, marketing, or advertising can be beneficial for grasping the more advanced concepts. Familiarity with consumer behavior, advertising basics, or digital marketing tools would also be advantageous, though not required, as foundational concepts will be covered. A curiosity for branding and a desire to understand what makes brands successful will help students get the most out of this course.
courses.description:
This course provides a comprehensive guide to the essentials of brand management, exploring everything from the basics of brand identity and equity to advanced positioning strategies and digital branding. It’s ideal for marketers, brand managers, and business professionals aiming to create lasting brand value. Through case studies, interactive lessons, and practical examples, students will learn how to foster customer loyalty, measure brand equity, and position a brand for maximum impact in an increasingly competitive market.
Section 1: Introduction
Students receive an overview of the course objectives, establishing a foundational understanding of brand management and its importance in the business world.
Section 2: Brand Management: An Introduction
This section covers the basics of branding and brand building, discussing innovation in branding, brand pitfalls, and the challenges of building customer loyalty. Key concepts like the customer loyalty pyramid give insight into what it takes to build a successful brand in today's market.
Section 3: Creating a Brand
Focused on the essentials of brand creation, this section introduces brand elements, the strategic fit of brand identity and image, and the different types of brands. Students learn how to craft a brand identity that resonates with audiences.
Section 4: Organizational Culture for Successful Brand Management
This section examines how organizational culture influences brand success. Real-world cultural examples, internal branding, and frameworks like the Brand Identity Prism demonstrate how cohesive internal values support brand consistency and value.
Section 5: Brand Equity: Like Money in the Bank
Brand equity is explored in-depth, starting with an introduction to the concept and the Brand Equity Pyramid. This section details how to build and leverage brand equity to maximize brand value.
Section 6: Measuring Brand Equity Report Card
Students learn quantitative and qualitative methods for measuring brand equity, with examples and case studies for hands-on practice. This section covers tools to track brand performance and improvement over time.
Section 7: Consumer Behavior and Brand Buying Decisions
This section explores consumer psychology and buying behavior, examining factors that influence brand preferences and purchase decisions. Topics include segmentation types and the determinants of consumer behavior, essential for targeting marketing efforts effectively.
Section 8: Brand Positioning
Positioning a brand is critical to its success. Students learn about positioning strategies, including positioning by price, product class, and other methods that set brands apart in a competitive landscape.
Section 9: Branding and Marketing Program
This section covers the marketing mix, focusing on the product mix, pricing, and distribution channels. Understanding these fundamentals is crucial to developing an effective brand strategy that aligns with broader business goals.
Section 10: Branding and Marketing Communication
Students explore the integrated marketing communication process and the promotional tools used to enhance brand equity. Through examples, they see how well-crafted communication strategies support brand recognition and growth.
Section 11: E-Branding: Building Brands Online
Digital branding is essential in today’s market. This section dives into e-branding, its advantages, and practical examples, equipping students with the tools to build brands in an online, borderless environment.
Section 12: Case Study: Aditya Birla Group - Branding in a Borderless World
This case study offers a deep dive into the branding strategy of the Aditya Birla Group. Students analyze its corporate logo significance, expansion strategy, and communication model, applying course concepts to a real-world scenario.
Section 13: Branding Quiz
An interactive quiz reinforces learning by challenging students to recognize brand logos, famous taglines, and brand ambassadors, enhancing their brand literacy and association skills.
Section 14: Conclusion
A final review of the course’s key concepts and insights, preparing students to implement brand management strategies in their professional pursuits.
This course provides students with the comprehensive knowledge needed to navigate the complexities of brand management. From foundational concepts to advanced strategies in brand positioning and digital branding, students emerge with a robust understanding of how to create, sustain, and grow powerful brands in the global market. Whether pursuing a career in brand management or enhancing a business, students will gain the confidence to apply these skills across various industries.
target_audience: This course is designed for aspiring brand managers, marketing professionals, business students, and entrepreneurs who want to build, manage, and grow successful brands. It’s also well-suited for professionals working in advertising, communications, or public relations who seek a deeper understanding of branding principles and strategies. Additionally, anyone interested in consumer behavior, digital branding, and brand equity—whether in a corporate setting or for personal projects—will find value in this course. Those looking to transition into brand management or expand their skill set in marketing will also benefit from the practical and theoretical insights provided.

courses.description:
Very unique is that we update our 2in1 course every couple of weeks, and host online workshops, so the value of the course grows exponentially for users who stay longer.


--Certification for people who finish this course included--
--Coming from a team working with clients from Silicon Valley to Amsterdam--


Do you believe in making a real positive impact on people?
In this course, we reveal all the behind-the-scenes principles of our event, design and branding teams, and how that lead to a 1000+ person yearly event. This course will focus on a great fundamentals overview of how to design, brand, advertise and market to target large sponsors, but also a way to scale your event planning skills & visitor sales. We will include case studies and step by step walkthroughs so you can start with confidence as a branding and design manager or event planner


Do you want access to a world-class team of people who are grinding every day in growth hacking, event growth, and performance sales?
In this course, our focus is on you. We are daily practitioners giving you answers when you ask them in the QnA. Making sure you get the most cutting-edge advice out there. This course is not just about the information inside, it's about you asking us questions if you have any. We answer within hours, not days which is the #1 positive feedback we get from our students. On top of that we'll do live workshops together and QnA's, as well as give away some 1 on 1's for people who need them.


Are we the real deal?


Please check out the video testimonials from our executive clients who run 7+ figure businesses.  And previews of speeches we were invited to speak, like Google Startupgrind.


These principles we're about to teach you are based on our very own blueprint and have been featured on TEDx, Google StartupGrind, and many more...
Outside of using these principles to help others, we also use them daily on our own team of over 50+ people, and they have been proven to work under the most extreme cases with people dealing from small startup teams to large corporates who have dealt with all the struggles you can have in event planning, branding, design, and marketing.


If you've ever struggled with a sponsor or client not taking you serious because of a bad looking website, or a proposal that doesn't inspire collaboration and you have no idea how to get them to reengage? Maybe you were looking for that one magic email to send them, that leads to closing an even bigger sponsorship with them. Then you'll definitely love having access to our team.


We're practitioners, that's why we can provide real use cases, 24/7 support, and a certification from an organization that has delivered thousands of trainings to corporate organizations worldwide.


This specific ELITEx 2in1 Event planning and Digital branding course is approx. 20 hours and more heavily focused on getting you up and running. In this course, we will be focused on:
Introduction and fundamentals
Branding 101 in the digital age at large scale with automation
Event planning small and 100+k events.
Expert interviews (From YouTubers with 5 million + subscribers to Startup Entrepreneurs with 1 million + clients, as well as some surprise marketing champions and global Event businesses like Disneyland Paris and Bundesliga)
Even though it is smaller, it's still ongoing and will be updated monthly with new QnA videos until we've answered all your questions. You can request the next topic once inside the course. So make sure to stay engaged once inside.


...


THIS IS FOR PEOPLE WHO ARE INTERESTED IN:
Events, Branding & Digital Marketing Training
Starting with Design and branding and events by learning the basics
Learning the fundamentals of digital branding and how to explain them to others, so they know the strategies behind all writing, design, advertising techniques
Beginners who are starting with branding and in the tech sector or a startup/scaleup
Branding & design management
event management
Event training topics
Event organization and conference exercises
Digital branding strategies
Beginner training
Digital Fundamentals for beginning event planners and branding people
Event tools and conference sheets for instructors who need more assets to scale their sales and visitor attendance
Design tools for business owners who need more royalty-free assets for their teams, like templates, proposals, and more...
Training your team
Business marketing events
How to guide your event and sales team
A great new way to create additional revenue and give yourself more credibility
Great step-by-step process and history to explain events better to beginners
DO NOT BUY THIS COURSE IF:
Only parts of this course may be relevant for you if you are a professional Event planner doing 7 figure sales and up. For that, you'll need our more in-depth courses.
This course is heavily focused on attracting what you need to get started or improve your basic teachings. You need to be comfortable with advertising and putting yourself in the digital world with your brand to people on the internet to accomplish this.
Even if you are a beginner or advanced, our entire team is here to answer your questions, so if you have a unique situation, getting this course is a cheaper way to get access to us.




Extra 10+ hour Expert interviews included.
* And a ton of extras, QnA's, Free update videos, More content, more expert interviews ...




A BRAND NEW WAY TO DO IMPACTFUL DESIGN, BRANDING & EVENTS!
Do you also find it extremely difficult to focus and stay in the moment – where you are actually enjoying the chaos of organizing events and attracting global corporate sponsors with great branding?
For the first time ever, as ELITEx, we’re launching the ultimate online 2in1 training.
We’ll be teaching you how we came up with our teachings through countless interactions with our clients from all over the world, from Silicon Valley to Amsterdam, and how we scaled it within our organization of over 50+ people. The best thing is that you can have zero experience starting out and we'll be able to guide you through the essential strategies of the event, sales, and branding process. That way people will request to work with you, instead of you asking them.


IS THIS PERFECT FOR YOU?
This is perfect for you if you’re a business owner, freelancer, or student that is looking to create a career path and wants to learn proven strategies and practices... Whether you're a beginner or seasoned event or branding expert we'll cover the basics of branding and event planning in this course.


Our practices have been featured in small rooms as well as in front of global audiences with thousands of people at our events, which you can see on the preview videos.


GET READY!
If you ever wondered how to start your branding or event career or explain certain practices to your team… but the only thing stopping you is the experience or lack of resources, then this course will be worth it to you.


...

LEARN
Our learning platform is updated monthly with new videos. If there is a certain topic you want to know about, please request this by asking us a question on the Platform. Our support and instructor team answer quickly.


Of course, the practical experience is half the work. That’s why we also invite you to our virtual job shadows, and any of our events, to really get practical with everything you learn. That's right, free access giveaways to our members to visit a live event.


CULTURE
We invest highly in the community culture, with live events, meetups, feedback Fridays, and collaborations. It is our everyday mission to create a creative, safe, and fun environment to thrive in.


...


ABOUT US
The ELITEx Program is a private online training community founded in 2018.
It’s the ultimate online school for impact creators, designed to teach you how to build and scale any skill that has the potential to bring good into the world and impact human lives, even if you have no idea where to start or you have no technical skills or knowledge.
Each year we have thousands of new people from all around the world enter our online training programs, and live events and I want to make sure that you can make an informed and educated decision on whether the ELITEx Program is right for you.




What people say about our live in-person events






“The event was fun, energetic, and inspiring… Thank you so much team, keep doing what you do, and stay in the core of all this energy.”




“This Event really opens up the calendar... I think it’s a win-win situation. I’ll definitely be inviting other partners to join the event as well.”




“What I really liked at this event is that it’s about giving back… You can be successful. But you can have even more success if you’re in an inspiring environment and today was all about that!”


“I think this event is one of those potential partnerships where you can get a lot of value out of it.
Thank you so much for having us and helping us with the preparations… It was really joyful to be here!”




“The giving back concept of the event as well as the people making impact is what I love. I think this is the start of a great initiative… Initiatives like this should be started in other places as well.”




“Empowering, inspiring, and connecting with other people...”

requirements: PCを持っている（Windows,Macいずれも可）
Googleアカウントを持っている
courses.description:
■はじめに
こんにちは、講師の藤本瞳です。私はこれまで、個人の方に200名以上、10社以上の企業にオンラインビジネスのコンサルティングをしてきました。


数多くのクライアントが、副業からブログをスタートして会社から独立したり、自身の会社を立ち上げて経営を安定させたり、オフラインのビジネスをオンラインに置き換えることに成功するお手伝いをさせていただきました。


このコースでは、最速で月収100万円を達成するためのダイレクトレスポンスマーケティングについて徹底解説します。


■コースを受講することで…
このコースを受講していただくと、ブログで報酬を得られるようになった人が、最速で月収7桁に到達できるDRM戦略の全体像とやることがわかります。

ブログは非常に魅力的なビジネスモデルですが、年々SEOは監視が厳しくなっており、かつライバルも強くなっています。またGoogle検索エンジンは頻繁にアップデートを繰り返しており、SEOだけに頼ったブログ収益だけでは、長期的な安定は見込めません。

そのため、早い段階であなたの顧客（＝あなたのファン）をつくり、ダイレクトレスポンスマーケティングで新たな収益源をつくっておくことがとても大切です。むしろ、今後はこの方法でしか生き残っていけなくなる可能性さえあります。

このコースは、すべてのオンラインビジネス実践者にとって必修といっても過言ではありません。

■このコースは全部で11セクションです

セクション1：はじめに
セクション2：月収100万円までのロードマップ
セクション3：ダイレクトレスポンスマーケティングとは
セクション4：ブログ実績をDRMに活かす方法
セクション5：DRM：事前準備編
セクション6：DRM：発信準備編
セクション7：DRM：発信実践編
セクション8：DRM：コンサル編
セクション9：特典コンテンツ：月収100万円を達成したあとは
セクション10：まとめとロードマップ解説
セクション11：ボーナスレクチャー


■こんな方が受講に向いています
ブログを実践中の方で、自分で1,000円程度の収益をあげられるようになり、これからDRMを実践してみたい方。ブログを更新し続けることになるのでは…？と不安になっている方。ブログ収益以外のマネタイズ方法を模索している方のために、本コースをつくりました。

このコースでは、DRMのスタートダッシュとして必要不可欠な要素をすべて解説しています。ワークシートの通りに実践していただければ、最速で月収7桁を狙うことができます。

また、「特典コンテンツ」として、直近私がたった80名のリストに対して38万円の高額商品のプロモーションを行い、8.6% という成約率を叩き出した実際のスケジュール表や、そのときのメールテンプレも併せて解説しています。

かなり赤裸々に、売れる企画プロモーションについても説明していますので、お楽しみに。


■最後に
本コースに興味をもっていただいた方は、動画終了後に「コース登録」へ進んでください。もっと検討したいという方はプレビューで講座の一部が見れますので、ぜひ講座を覗いてみてください。


それでは、コースのなかでお会いできることを楽しみにしています！
target_audience: ブログですこしでも稼いだことがある人

ブログを皮切りにもっと稼いでいきたい人
ブログのその先の道筋が見えていない人

courses.description:
Dear Solopreneurs, Small Entrepreneurs, and Start-Up Owners,
Working independently towards your goals is exciting. But when it comes to marketing your goods and services, things can become difficult, and I know this feeling. You may be struggling with many decisions right now, such as:
What to write on the landing page of your business,
What to post on social media this week,
How to decide your overall voice & tone,
Visual imagery and styling for your designs,
What to say in marketing campaigns, etc.
Let me give you the hidden ingredient in this story: you don’t have a brand strategy and a visual brand identity.
But don't worry—this course will answer many of the questions in your mind and give you the fundamental elements of brand creation.
Believe it or not, many experienced business owners lack this information, so they spend a lot of money on marketing right away. But as a solopreneur, small entrepreneur, or start-up owner, I know you don't have the luxury of using all your budget for such an expensive lesson.
Here, with this small course, you will:
Be able to write your brand strategy
Become familiar with the core idea behind successful brand stories
Learn your role as the brand leader
Understand why people buy and why people follow any brand
Have a clear idea about who you are and how you communicate
Define your mission, vision, and value proposition
Define a brand story that everyone will love to hear
Find a unique and strategic naming solution for your brand
Decide which solution to use for your visual identity
In the end, with all this information, you will be able to build a brand reputation first. This way, you will be able to grow organically more than you would with a digital advertising campaign. Your audience will be excited to hear from you, and they will feel connected to your story for a long time.
In the future, you can decide to use some of your budget on advertising, of course. But as a new brand leader who is at the beginning of their journey, I assure you that all you need is branding first.
Thank you for watching.
target_audience: Solopreneurs who are ready to start their business
Freelancers who would like to thrive as a professional brand
Entrepreneurs who already founded their business but struggle with their marketing communication assets

courses.title: Unlocking the Power of Psychology in Design
courses.bio: Learn how to create or evaluate effective design for your brand
objectives: Uncover the Secrets of Psychological Design Principles
Decipher the Psychology of Color, Fonts, and Shapes
Actionable Strategies for Effective Branding
Creative Inspiration and Real-World Examples
requirements: Basic terminology in branding, marketing and design fields.
courses.description:
Are you tired of superficial discussions about what "looks good" in design, or hearing that design should align with personal preferences? It's time to shift your perspective and recognize the true potential of design – to serve a purpose for your brand. Welcome to our comprehensive course, "Unlocking the Power of Psychology in Design."
In this transformative course, we invite you to explore the intriguing and dynamic relationship between psychology and design. Our mission is to empower you with a deep understanding of how psychology can be harnessed to make strategic design choices that resonate with your target audience.
Designed for graphic designers, marketers, business owners, or anyone with a curiosity for the psychological underpinnings of effective branding, this course provides actionable strategies and sparks creative inspiration. Whether you're creating brand designs or evaluating existing ones, you'll gain the knowledge, skills, and insights needed to craft designs that truly connect with your audience.
What to Expect:
Uncover the Secrets of Psychological Design Principles: Delve into the psychology of design by dissecting two core psychological principles that underlie successful branding. Learn how to harness these principles to create designs that engage, persuade, and resonate with your audience.
Decipher the Psychology of Color, Fonts, and Shapes: Gain an in-depth understanding of how color, fonts, and shapes can profoundly impact the way people perceive and interact with your brand. Unlock the potential to convey specific emotions, messages, and associations through your design choices.
Actionable Strategies for Effective Branding: Beyond theory, this course equips you with practical tools and strategies. Discover how to apply psychological insights to your design process, transforming your creative ideas into powerful brand assets.
Creative Inspiration and Real-World Examples: Explore real-world case studies and examples that illustrate the psychology of design in action. Be inspired by the success stories of brands that have harnessed psychology to drive engagement and loyalty.
Unlock the doors to effective branding by understanding the psychology behind design. Enroll in this course and embark on a journey to become a design-savvy professional or a more informed brand evaluator. Join us in the quest to make design not just "pretty" but purposeful, and witness the transformative impact it can have on your brand's success.
Don't miss this opportunity to elevate your design skills and your brand's impact. Enroll today and start crafting designs that truly resonate.
target_audience: Designed for graphic designers, marketers, business owners, or anyone with a curiosity for the psychological underpinnings of effective branding, this course provides actionable strategies and sparks creative inspiration. Whether you're creating brand designs or evaluating existing ones, you'll gain the knowledge, skills, and insights needed to craft designs that truly connect with your audience.

courses.description:
Ready to build a brand that stands out, makes an impact, and drives long-term success? This course is your ultimate guide to building a memorable brand with a purpose that resonates with your audience and leaves a lasting social impact!
In this step-by-step course, you’ll unlock the secrets behind powerful brand building and learn how to create a brand that not only drives sales but also contributes to a greater cause. Whether you're a new entrepreneur or an experienced marketer looking to refresh your brand, this course will show you how to:


Craft a unique brand identity that speaks to your target audience with clarity and confidence.
Identify the right trends (like AI, IoT, and VR) and leverage social impact to grow your brand in today’s competitive market.
Map the customer journey and use key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure success every step of the way.
Build and nurture your brand community, creating loyal advocates who help spread the word about your brand.
Master content strategy and communication to boost engagement, awareness, and conversions across all channels.
Packed with actionable strategies, and practical tools, this course will guide you from brand concept to execution, ensuring you can take your business to the next level. Don’t just create a brand—create a brand with purpose, meaning, and lasting impact.
Start your journey today and transform your brand into something truly unforgettable. Make your mark—build a brand that not only sells but inspires!


Journey through the 8C Framework:


Unique CONCEPT: Define what makes your brand distinctive.
Ideal CUSTOMER: Identify and understand your target audience.
Define the CREATOR: Recognize the vision behind your brand.
Groundbreaking CREATION: Innovate products/services that disrupt the market.
Brand COMMUNITY: Build a loyal network around your brand.
Smart CAMPAIGN: Strategize your marketing initiatives effectively.
Effective COMMUNICATION: Ensure your messaging is clear and impactful.
CONTROL & Measurement: Establish metrics for evaluating success.


Alignment: This course aligns with the principles of sustainable economies, the B Corporation model, and businesses dedicated to creating lasting value.


About your instructor: Oana Mudura, founder of Koolt Communication and a CIM-accredited Chartered Marketer, blends her background in broadcast journalism with her deep expertise in marketing to empower brands to make a positive, measurable impact.
Join us for this action-packed, 1-hour masterclass, and get the tools you need to craft a brand that not only stands out but also makes a real difference. Ready to turn your vision into an impactful brand? Enroll now!
