requirements: Para la realización de este curso (Impulso, Crecimiento y Desarrollo de Profesionales Creativos) no ser requieren grandes conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0.
Cuando compres el curso vas a poder acceder a las clases cuando y donde quieras. El curso se queda en tu cuenta de Udemy para siempre. :)
Interés por crecer en el negocio o la profesión de arquitecto, decorador y diseñador de interiores
Muy recomendable si ya trabajas en el sector de la creatividad, la decoración y el interiorismo y deseas actualizar y mejorar tus conocimientos teórico-prácticos para progresar en tu trabajo.
Tener una mente abierta, ser creativo, apasionado del diseño y entusiasta del buen estilo, serán tus mejores herramientas para triunfar en este apasionante sector.

Hardware: Para usar Adobe InDesign al igual que el resto de programas de la suite de Adobe (PhotoShop, Illustrator...) no necesitarás el equipo más potente del mundo, ya que se trata de un software que requiere de pocos recursos hardware. Además está disponible tanto para sistemas operativos Windows como MacOs.
El más importante requisito para realizar este curso es el entusiasmo y la motivación por aprender nuevas habilidades que aumenten tus competencias profesionales.
courses.description:
Impulso, Crecimiento y Desarrollo de Profesionales Creativos
Aprende las Herramientas de Comunicación y Habilidades de Marketing para tener más Visibilidad para profesional.
Instructores: Álvaro García y Lucía Fernández. Actualizado: Septiembre del 2025 Estudiantes: +3.600  Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Descripción del Curso:
Impulsa tu carrera creativa con un sistema práctico para ganar visibilidad, atraer clientes y diferenciar tu marca personal. Aprenderás a definir tu posicionamiento y propuesta de valor, construir un portafolio que vende, pulir tu storytelling y copywriting, y lanzar una estrategia multicanal en LinkedIn, Instagram, Behance y email marketing, con SEO personal y tácticas de networking que abren puertas.
Impartido en Udemy y apto para todas las edades y niveles, el curso incluye plantillas, guiones, checklists y calendarios de contenido para aplicar de inmediato. Dominarás embudos simples, pricing y negociación, métricas clave (KPI, tasa de conversión) y un método repetible que convierte atención en oportunidades reales: más consultas, mejores colaboraciones y crecimiento sostenible como profesional creativo.
El Curso Más Completo en Udemy para desarrollar tus habilidades de comunicación y marketing digital y presencial y dar visibilidad a tu Profesión de Creativo, Interiorista, Arquitecto o Decorador: Aprenderás Marca Persona + Preséntate con Seguridad + Las Claves para tu Plan de Comunicación+ Identificarás a tu Cliente Ideal+ Crearás tu Propia Página Web Portfolio + Crea tu Blog Profesional + Crea tu Libro de Autor Impreso
En la formación Impulso, Crecimiento y Desarrollo de habilidades de Comunicación y Marketing para Profesionales Creativos aprenderás como crear tu Marca Personal como Profesional Creativo, a Presentarte con Seguridad como Profesionales, Crearás tu Plan de Comunicación, Aprenderás a generar diversas herramientas de visibilidad, tanto Online como Offline (crear nuestra Propia Página Web Portfolio para vender nuestro servicios, Crearemos nuestro Blog Profesional, etc) y lo aprenderemos desde cero, hasta nivel profesional. La formación integra herramientas de diseño gráfico y audiovisual en un solo ecosistema, para comunicar y expresar tus ideas y entrenar tu creatividad. Aprenderemos a aplicar lo aprendido en nuestro plan de comunicación haciendo nuestra propia Página Web Portfolio, un Blog, un Libro Creativo. El curso es perfecto para usuarios con cero o muy poco conocimiento o trayectoria profesional, así como para quienes tienen una amplia trayectoria profesional y quieren desarrollar más su negocio.


Itinerario Formativo:
Introducción y Bienvenida Impulso, Crecimiento y Desarrollo de Profesionales Creativos.
Crea tu Marca Personal de Profesional Creativo
Preséntate con Seguridad como Profesional Creativo
Crea tu Plan de Comunicación
Identifica a Tu Cliente Ideal
Crea tu Propia Página Web Porfolio Online y vende tus servicios profesionales a clientes de todo el mundo.
Crea tu Blog Profesional y posicionate como referente
Crea tu Propio Libro de Autor Impreso y aúna todos tus proyectos y creaciones en un documento impreso que te posicione como referente
Recursos para el Alumno del  Impulso, Crecimiento y Desarrollo de habilidades de Comunicación y Marketing para Profesionales Creativos
Emisión del Certificado de Finalización "Impulso, Crecimiento y Desarrollo de Profesionales Creativos"


Objetivos del curso:
Dominarás un sistema práctico para hacerte visible y diferenciar tu marca personal: posicionamiento, elevator pitch, portafolio que vende, copywriting y storytelling, SEO personal, LinkedIn/Instagram/Behance, email marketing y networking con método. Implementarás embudos simples, CRM básico, calendario de contenidos, pricing y negociación, medición de KPI y automatizaciones ligeras para convertir atención en clientes.


Salidas profesionales:
Te prepara para crecer como freelance creativo, consultor/a de marca personal, content/social media specialist o biz dev en estudios y agencias. Saldrás con un pipeline activo, propuestas persuasivas, mejores tarifas, y un proceso replicable para conseguir más oportunidades, colaboraciones y clientes de forma sostenida.


Dirigido a:
Diseñadores, interioristas, arquitectos, ilustradores, fotógrafos, 3D, motion, marketers y estudiantes de todas las edades y niveles que necesitan más visibilidad y clientes. Al impartirse en Udemy, aprendes a tu ritmo con plantillas, guiones y checklists listos para aplicar desde el primer día en tu marca personal o estudio creativo.


Metodología de Aprendizaje:
Recuerda que este curso incluye lecciones en vídeo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artículos didácticos, actividades, animaciones, ilustraciones, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interés, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalización, tutorización online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicación del curso.
La modalidad de este curso te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tú quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase según tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos... Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al máximo la formación, pero también puedes decidir ver este curso como una guía de referencia.
Las clases están claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten más importantes según tus necesidades formativas. La mayoría de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lección sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para seguir el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El curso está orientado a aquellos creativos que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer múltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano de los instructores Álvaro García y Lucía Fernández. Además la formación disponen de acceso automático al contenido, sin limitación de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al día los 7 días de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantía de devolución.
Con esta formación disfrutarás aprendiendo desde dónde quieras, sin tener que desplazarte, sin horarios, con quién quieras, según tus necesidades y disponibilidad. Aprenderás con un instructor avalado por miles da alumnos satisfechos en todo el mundo (comentarios certificados). Conocerás las técnicas, métodos, trucos y flujos de trabajo de este sector creativo. El docente te transmitirá su sabiduría y conocimientos con pasión a la vez que las explicaciones concisas, claras, sencillas y con un enfoque profesional en cada clase. Podrás conseguir un  certificado homologado personalizado y firmado por tu instructor en cada formación. De está forma podrás compartir tu título en tu portafolio, currículo, en redes sociales...
Con la alta definición de los vídeos (vídeo fullHD y audio de estudio) conseguirá no te perder detalle. Podrás ver las clases las veces que requieras para recordar y perfeccionar tus habilidades como diseñador. Tendrás la posibilidad de preguntar, pedir opinión y ayuda al instructor, además de compartir tu experiencia de aprendizaje con los demás alumnos del curso, tan apasionados como tú, repartidos por todo el mundo. Seleccionamos cuidadosamente los contenidos y producimos cada curso para garantizar una experiencia de aprendizaje online integral y de la máxima calidad.


¿A qué esperas?, este curso es ideal para ti, atrévete a convertirte en un experto y expresa tus ideas de la forma que siempre has deseado. Adelante, nos vemos dentro de la formación ;)
target_audience: Diseñadores, arquitectos, interioristas y creativos que buscan visibilidad, marca personal sólida y clientes en LinkedIn e Instagram.
Freelancers y estudios pequeños que quieren un sistema de captación: portafolio que vende, SEO personal y email marketing efectivo.
Estudiantes y junior creatives que necesitan posicionamiento, elevator pitch y un plan de contenidos con calendario y KPI claros.
Marketers y community managers que desean profesionalizar propuestas, pricing y negociación para cerrar proyectos mejor pagados.
Fotógrafos, ilustradores y 3D que buscan networking estratégico, colaboraciones y un pipeline organizado con CRM y automatizaciones.

requirements: No
courses.description:
Do you need to raise more money? Your answer is to tell an effective story that moves your audience to action. I can show you how.
I want to help you and your organization tell a story, raise the money you need, and make an impact. No more wondering what’s going to work, what’s not going to work, how do we get started, etc. With the basic principles I’m sharing from years of storytelling and marketing, you can be confident in leveraging your story for the success of your organization and the people you serve.
Raise more money to fuel your cause.
Empower your team to properly tell your organization's story.
Energize your supporters.
I’m a filmmaker and marketer, and I’ve helped many non-profit organizations tell their stories, and increase their fundraising. I’ve worked with churches, ministries, children’s hospitals, children’s homes, United Way organizations, youth camps, and more. I make a living helping people tell their story. This workshop is from a speech I gave to a room full of non-profit leaders. They walked away empowered to tell their story, and you can, too. My team recorded the presentation and it's accessible to you now!

courses.title: Strategize Brand Management : Direct-to-Consumer (D2C)
courses.bio: Strategies for Growth, Engagement, and Dominance in Direct-to-Consumer Ventures"
objectives: Understanding D2C Landscape: Explore D2C model, its evolution, advantages, and challenges
Crafting Brand Identities: Develop authentic brand personas and value propositions tailored for D2C channels.
Executing Marketing Strategies: Learn effective tactics like social media marketing, influencer collaborations, and data-driven advertising.
Enhancing Customer Experience: Optimize CX from discovery to post-purchase, fostering long-term loyalty.

Introduction to D2C Business: The Rise of D2C in India
Product Fundamentals in D2C: The Core of a D2C Product
Scaling and Team Building: Cultivating a Culture of Growth and Innovation

requirements: This course welcomes individuals from all backgrounds, requiring no programming experience. Rather than technical skills, it focuses on strategic brand management, marketing, and customer experience optimization for D2C businesses. With practical, non-technical materials and supportive resources, students will gain valuable skills without the need for programming knowledge.
courses.description:
Welcome to the forefront of brand innovation in the digital era! Prepare to embark on a transformative journey delving deep into the intricate world of Direct-to-Consumer (D2C) brand management. Our comprehensive course is your gateway to mastering the art of building and nurturing D2C brands, empowering you with the skills and insights to excel in today's competitive landscape.
Within these digital halls of learning, we guide you through crafting captivating brand narratives that resonate profoundly with your target audience. Learn the alchemy of storytelling, transforming your brand into an unforgettable experience for consumers.
But storytelling is just the beginning. We unravel the mysteries of leveraging cutting-edge digital technologies to elevate brand visibility and drive unparalleled engagement. From immersive social media campaigns to captivating content strategies, you'll discover how to create a digital footprint that leaves a lasting impression.

And let us not forget the power of data. Dive deep into the ocean of analytics, harnessing its currents to navigate the ever-shifting tides of consumer behavior. Transform raw data into actionable insights, guiding your brand's evolution with precision and purpose.
But above all, our mission is to instill in you the ethos of customer-centricity. Cultivate genuine connections with your audience, weaving personalized experiences that resonate on a profound level. For in the realm of D2C brand management, it is the human touch that reigns supreme.
Whether you're a novice entrepreneur or a seasoned marketing maestro, our course offers a kaleidoscope of insights and strategies to propel your D2C venture to the zenith of success. Join us, and together, let's redefine the future of brand management in the digital age."

courses.description:
If you are responsible for establishing and earning your company's brand, this course can help you achieve that goal.
'Earning Your Small Business Brand - Your Story Your Playbook' walks you through the process of articulating and organizing the components of your company's identity that are foundational to your brand. Explore how your identity can shine through your marketing tools, and how those marketing tools help you establish your presence for your intended audience. Then, we focus on how exceptional experiences create loyal fans. Through this process, called the Brand Equation (Identity + Tools + Presence + Experience = Brand), your business will be on track to earn the brand you want.
This understandable and straightforward class is for businesses and startups who want to get the process right. The 36 short lectures and multiple worksheets help you every step of the way. Regardless of where you are in your business's marketing journey, this course helps you enhance and organize the marketing components you already have in place. The course also includes sample communications to help inform your team of your progress.

The Author Website Masterclass will show you how to create an original, professional-looking, mobile responsive author website, where you can engage with your readers and turn them into fans

One of the biggest hurdles that a new author faces at the beginning of their self-publishing career is that of anonymity.
Fortunately, there are a number of strategies available to self-published authors to overcome this, such as Perma-free Books, Lead Magnets, Front and Back Matter Promotions, Search Engine Optimisation, Video Marketing and Guest Post Commenting, each of which can be very effective.
Central to all of these promotional strategies is an online presence and in particular an author website.
If you have yet to start building your writer platform, then now is the time to do so, beginning with the creation of a great looking author website.
A step-by-step guide to creating a professional responsive website that you will be proud of
In this course, you will get an over-the-shoulder view as I build a responsive author website totally from scratch for one of my niches, step-by-step.

In this way you will learn:
How to brand your author website, create a Gravatar, choose a domain name, a hosting package and how to propagate your domain name to your hosting package
How to install WordPress, configure the basic settings, install a premium theme, install a premium skin and customise your website to make it look totally original
How to choose the correct plugins for your website, add engaging content and of course your library of books.

The building of a mobile responsive author website really is a MUST for every self-published author. And this course will walk you through it every step of the way.
target_audience: Self-published authors looking to increase their online presence
Self-published authors looking to promote their books
Self-published authors looking to connect with their readers

¿Cómo decidir en un mundo lleno de marcas? Incluso más importante, ¿cómo logramos que nuestra marca sea única y memorable en un mundo cubierto por marcas? ¿podemos ser indispensables para nuestra audiencia?

Branding - La Historia Detrás De La Marca, es un curso pensado para entregar las herramientas necesarias para convertir tu marca en una experiencia, una religión ... crearemos una marca única a través de la historia que la acompaña.
Durante las clases acompañaremos los conceptos teóricos con ejemplos del mundo real. De esta forma podremos comprobar el efecto que tienen sobre el desempeño de las marcas las decisiones que tomamos.
Comenzaremos nuestro recorrido por lo básico: ¿Qué es una marca?, para poco a poco avanzar hacia las implicancias de convertir tu marca en una experiencia para tus diferentes públicos. Lo importante es dar un paso más, y llevaremos esa experiencia a una verdadera religión a través de sencillos pasos.
El curso está pensado para gestores de marca, el equipo de una startup, un sitio web e incluso a profesionales buscando mejorar su propia marca personal.
Al final del curso serás capaz de situar tu marca a la par de Apple, Nike, Harley-Davidson y Lego. ¿Te animas?
Vamos a empezar!

1) Nociones Generales
2) ¿Qué es una marca?
3) Los pilares de marca
4) Convirtiendo la experiencia en una religión
5) Marcas fuertes

8) Capítulo de cierre

Los Estudiantes más avanzados podrán saltar algunas lecciones pero se recomienda seguir las lecturas y casos de estudio.

Los principiantes en el tema podrán comenzar con confianza y tranquilidad pues el contenido será explicado con calma, acompañado de ejemplos reconocibles por todos ... Si ha oído hablar de Apple, Samsung, Michael Kors o Starbucks entonces se sentirá como en casa.

objectives: Master Python Microservices from basics to advanced
Be able to build Python Microservices

Context Managers in Python Microservices: What to do inside an exception handler

requirements: You will learn from very basics. No prior knowledge is required
courses.description:
Python microservices represent an architectural approach where a large application is divided into smaller, independent services that communicate over well-defined APIs. This methodology aligns with the microservices architecture, which emphasizes modularity, scalability, and resilience. Python, with its simplicity and vast ecosystem, is a popular choice for implementing microservices due to its ability to streamline development and deployment.
Each microservice in a Python-based system is designed to handle a specific business capability, ensuring separation of concerns. For instance, a service might manage user authentication, while another handles payment processing. These services are loosely coupled, meaning that changes or failures in one service minimally impact others, enhancing fault tolerance. Communication between microservices typically occurs through REST APIs, gRPC, or message brokers like RabbitMQ and Kafka. Python microservices also pose challenges. Managing distributed systems can be complex, requiring robust logging, monitoring, and error handling. Tools like Prometheus, Grafana, and ELK Stack are often employed to address these issues. Additionally, careful planning is needed to handle data consistency and inter-service communication efficiently.
Python microservices offer a flexible and scalable way to design modern applications. By leveraging Python’s rich ecosystem and adhering to best practices, developers can create robust systems capable of evolving with business needs while maintaining high performance and reliability.
target_audience: Python developers
Software engineers

requirements: No marketing, design or business experience required! This course breaks down the techniques highly sophisticated brands use in a very practical, step-by-step way that anyone can do.
courses.description:
I can't tell you how many times I've heard Marketers described as a "gurus" or "wizards", as if there's something mystical about what we do. The truth is, there's nothing magical about it. If you can gather the right information and follow the right process, you've got what it takes to be a Marketer.
Brand strategy is an area I've noticed people get particularly confused about, which is why I've designed this course to demystify the process of building a brand.
I've broken it down into very hands-on steps that help you bring together all of your business ideas and transform them into a professional brand that stands out and really communicates what you have to offer.
At the end of the course you will know your brand inside and out, which will clarify what you're selling, who you're selling it to and how to sell it.
You'll have a compass that will guide you through all your future business decisions, making them faster and easier.
And you'll have a ready-to-go brand reference document for your own use but also for agencies and collaborators, that ensures any work on your brand consistently aligns with your vision, saving you time and money.
target_audience: Hobbyists, small business owners and start-ups who want to create a brand the right way from the start
Owners of existing enterprises who need to get more strategic and professional about their brand-building
Non-marketers who are moving into a role with brand responsibility
New or graduate marketers who are trying to figure out how to apply the theory they learned at school in a real-world environment
Experienced marketers looking for a framework to tighten their organisation's brand strategy process

courses.title: Personal Branding: From Audit to Action
courses.bio: How to Create, Leverage, and Love Your Personal Brand (For People that Aren't Professional Marketers!)
objectives: How to think about your personal brand
What a personal brand is (and isn't)
Leveraging your unfair advantage
Planning, tools, and content creation
Branding

Closing: BONUS: AI and Your Personal Brand

requirements: Desire to see the big picture
Willingness to dig deep
courses.description:
If you have huge goals for your personal and professional life, but you’ve struggled to create a personal brand to get you there… this is the most important course you can take right now.


Many people want a personal brand. Most will even take steps to build one - but very few will actually be successful. Without a clear plan, it’s too easy to get overwhelmed by the process.


Let’s be real here. Yes, there’s a TON to build up front (blog, website, logo, etc.), and even after the initial setup, the content creation is seemingly endless.


In today’s crowded market, it can feel impossible to stand out - or even really put into words what you have to offer and why it’s special…Which is why, after pouring days or weeks of work into their personal brand, many people abandon it entirely and surrender its huge benefits.


They burn out or never really get momentum.


In this course you'll get a firehose of training on creating, leveraging, and loving your personal brand with Jon’s 7 modules of video training. You’ll learn the start-to-finish process of personal branding as well as score some downloadable resources and tools to help you accelerate the process as you go. If you know it's time for you to get organized with your personal brand, this is where to start! And guess what... it's NOT all about TikTok videos and marketing activities. This is for people looking for something a little more mature, a little more personal, and who are in a process of of growing themselves as people. Modules include:


Intro: What’s this Course all About?
Audit: Where are you Starting From?
Your Unfair Advantage
Organizing and Priorities
Creating the “Things” and What to Focus on First
Your Content Rhythm (Social, email, video, etc.)
What’s Next

If you still need convincing...
Personal branding isn’t just for celebrities and high-level speakers anymore.


In fact, if you’re an award-winning TED talk presenter and NYT Best Selling Author… go somewhere else!


I want REAL people ready to make REAL moves to make REAL progress.


Look, in today’s uncertain world, YOU are your best bet. YOU are the best investment you can make!


Which means that your personal brand is going to have ROI way beyond whatever your immediate sales/financial goals are. It’s bigger than that. It’s about YOU…


Here's The Good News...
EVERYONE needs to get this right.


And with the right process, ANYONE can!


All you need is a proven framework that’s worked for tons of other personal brands before you that you can follow to a tee for massive results.


In other words… JUST COPY MY PROCESS!

You’ve Been Starting In The Wrong Place
If you’ve managed to “start” creating your personal brand but have never followed through… you’ve probably been prioritizing the wrong things.


Don’t worry. Like I said, MOST people get this part wrong. They realize the importance of their personal brand, get super motivated to create one, and start knocking out content…


Only to get overwhelmed and end up with a disjointed collection of videos, blog posts, design, and other “stuff” that doesn’t actually get them anywhere.


What you actually need to start with is a FRAMEWORK…


A plan that details your personal and professional goals, identifies where you’re currently at in each area of your branding, provides a roadmap of what you need to do to get from A to Z, and measures your success. It's big. And it's not about being really busy with marketing activities... it's about YOU.


That’s exactly what I’ll walk you through in this course.


I call it “4D Process.”


And here’s the best thing about it…


It Doesn’t Require ANY Marketing Experience
The most important part of creating your personal brand doesn’t start with marketing stuff like click-through rates, ad costs, Pantone colors, or form fills. Nope.


It starts by figuring out who you are, what you’re about, and where you’re going.


These are questions only you can answer… and you can easily do so without a marketing degree.


As for the rest of the process - i.e., moving from vision to execution - well, that’s what this series is all about.


I do have a background in marketing, and I’m going to walk you through how to either complete each step of this process yourself, or outsource it to the appropriate party.


As you do this, here’s what will happen:


First, you’ll gain more confidence and clarity in the role of your personal brand as it relates to your life’s goals than ever before.


This is crucial because when you determine exactly what you want out of life, with it will come a massive amount of excitement and motivation to reach those new goals.


The next thing that’ll happen is this:


You Will Spur LONG-LASTING Momentum That Doesn’t Go Away
If you’ve tried and failed to create your personal brand before, you know how critical it is to KEEP GOING!


And it’s not just about grit. It’s about marrying Passion and a Plan together to make your process unstoppable.


Everyone will have obstacles in the process. Eventually, you hit walls with your content. You hit walls in your life. You get stumped, stalled, or tripped up. I get it.


Things stopped lining up, you got confused about your messaging, or you got overwhelmed by your endless to-do list.


All of those problems will EVAPORATE when you start with a PLAN: one that tells you exactly where to go and exactly how to get there.


Once you have this, you can start making real, linear progress toward your goals.


You’ll stop overthinking your messaging or changing your mind halfway through. No work will be wasted on activities that ultimately don’t line up with your brand.


I will help you say No to things.


And by the time you’ve reached the fourth and final step of this process, you’ll have the personal brand of your dreams - one you can leverage to achieve all life has to offer.


And you’ll be flying with your own wings.

Photoshop did 80% of the work for me. I want to show you my secret and hassle-free method of creating a professional full responsive email signature you can apply to your emails without needing to know code.
I also take this course one step further by showing you how I started a pretty passive side business which generated over £500 per month when I was only 18/19 years old and how I automated it. I take you through the whole journey in a NO JARGON, realistic teaching structure you will understand!
I give you all the tools and templates you need to not only create professional and high converting email signatures but ALSO to start a side business and 90% auto-pilot selling email signatures.
In this course I will walk you through, step by step on how to create an email signature using photoshop and then making that email signature live and clickable. Once you have the foundations in place, I will then show you how to setup your own email signature business and where you can find leads and automate the process.
This is an indepth and straight to the point course unlike anything else on the email signature market. I've been providing email signatures since I was 18-19 years old. I have a wealth of experience in email signatures and online activities. If you've been looking for a course to finally setup a email signature for you with zero tech, enroll today.

courses.title: SERVICES MARKETING
courses.bio: Navigating Services Marketing in a Digitally Connected World
requirements: Basic understanding of market.
College level students
courses.description:
The objective of the  Services Marketing course is to equip students with the skills and knowledge to develop and implement creative strategies for enhancing service offerings. This course emphasizes the role of innovation in improving customer experiences, service delivery processes, and value propositions. Students will learn how to integrate technology, customer-centric approaches, and sustainable practices to differentiate service brands and drive business growth. By exploring case studies, emerging trends, and real-world challenges, the course aims to foster a mindset of continuous improvement and adaptability, enabling students to create competitive advantages in the service sector.
The second objective of the Innovation in Services Marketing course is to foster an understanding of how innovation can transform traditional service models and lead to the development of unique customer experiences. Students will explore the use of advanced technologies, such as artificial intelligence, data analytics, and automation, to streamline operations and personalize services. Additionally, the course will emphasize the importance of co-creation with customers, encouraging students to actively involve customers in the innovation process. By the end of the course, students will be able to design innovative service solutions that not only meet but exceed customer expectations, thereby enhancing customer loyalty and long-term business success.
By applying these concepts, students will practice designing personalized marketing strategies, using tools like data analytics to predict customer needs, and co-developing new service solutions through customer engagement. This knowledge will empower them to drive innovation in various service industries, from healthcare to retail.
This course will enrich the participants with the knowledge of  services marketing.  They will understand the characteristics of Services  classification of services; Consumer versus Industrial Services, Model of Service segmentation strategy, Global and Indian Scenario in services sector.  The students will further understand  :
7 Ps of Services Marketing Mix
Customer satisfaction strategies
Service Quality:
Importance of quality in Services;
How customers evaluate service performance,
Service Quality Models Parsuraman- Zeithamal- Bitner (PZB) Gaps Model, SERVQUAL ,
Technology & Service Strategy:
Applying technology to service settings,
e-services etc.,

Beginners who want to learn marketing and choose their profession into marketing management.

Instructores: Arq. Álvaro García y Arq. Lucía Fernández. Actualizado: Septiembre del 2025 Estudiantes: +4.500 Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Descripción del Curso:
Convierte tu trayectoria en un CV + PortFolio creativo de arquitectura e interiorismo que abre puertas. Aprenderás a seleccionar y narrar proyectos con propósito, a diseñar láminas con jerarquía tipográfica y retícula editorial, y a integrar renders, planos y fotografías en un relato profesional convincente. Crearás un PDF interactivo/ATS-friendly, versiones para Behance y LinkedIn, y un dossier comercial listo para enviar a estudios y clientes.
Impartido en Udemy y apto para todas las edades y niveles, trabajas con plantillas editables, checklists y ejemplos reales para acelerar resultados. Saldrás con un portafolio pulido y una identidad clara: branding personal, tono visual coherente, copy persuasivo y recursos prácticos para actualizar tu perfil en minutos. Si buscas diferenciarte y mejorar tu empleabilidad en arquitectura e interiorismo, este curso es tu atajo profesional.
Somos Álvaro y Lucía, arquitectos con más de 10 años de experiencia y hemos desarrollado este curso para ti si eres: arquitecto, paisajista, interiorista, decorador o creativo para que puedas mostrar con éxito tus trabajos y creaciones.
Sabemos que el área de marketing es fundamental para todos los profesionales y dada la importancia de Curriculum Vitae y viendo que es un instrumento indispensable a la hora de solicitar un empleo en cualquier profesión o captar nuevos clientes, sabemos un CV Portafolio o Portfolio lo es todavía más para completar el curriculum de un arquitecto, interiorista, paisajista, decorador o creativo.
Tu Portfolio consistirá en un dossier en el que se detallan y muestran tus trabajos, ya sean los desarrollados durante la etapa académica o aquellos elaborados recientemente.
En el curso aprenderás a hacer dos tipos de Portfolio: el portfolio digital o el portfolio impreso. En ambos casos, el primer paso para hacer un portfolio de arquitectura es recopilar toda la información gráfica de tus proyectos y trabajos (dibujos, croquis, diagramas, planos, fotografías, etc.) y ordenarlos según tu criterio de diseño.
Utilizaremos un programa profesional de edición:
Adobe InDesign es una aplicación profesional de maquetación de páginas que ofrece un control absoluto sobre diseño y tipografía. En este curso fundamental te enseñaremos las técnicas, los trucos y consejos que necesitas para comenzar a diagramar y diseñar páginas con esta potente aplicación.




Itinerario Formativo:
Introducción a la Plataforma Udemy
Bienvenida al curso "Crea tu CV PortFolio Creativo de Arquitecto Interiorista"
Creación de Nuestro Portfolio CV Creativo
Crea tu Porfolio en Un Software Libre
Creación de Nuestro Curriculum Portfolio
Recursos para el Alumno del curso "Crea tu CV PortFolio Creativo de Arquitecto Interiorista"
Emisión del Certificado de Finalización del Curso "Crea tu CV PortFolio Creativo de Arquitecto Interiorista"


Objetivos del curso:
Crearás un CV + PortFolio de arquitectura e interiorismo profesional y memorable: selección estratégica de proyectos, storytelling claro, retícula editorial y jerarquía tipográfica; integración de renders, planos y fotos; PDF interactivo y ATS-friendly, versiones para Behance/LinkedIn y un dossier comercial que comunica valor y resultados.


Salidas profesionales:
Aumentarás tu empleabilidad y tasa de entrevistas en estudios de arquitectura, interiorismo, promotoras, retail/hospitality y marcas de mobiliario. Podrás postular con ventaja a roles de Arquitecto/Interiorista junior, Delineante/3D Artist, Asistente de proyecto o freelance, con un portafolio que vende y justifica impacto.


Dirigido a:
Estudiantes, recién graduados y profesionales que necesitan un portafolio competitivo y un CV que pase filtros y conquiste a reclutadores. Ideal para arquitectos, interioristas, diseñadores 3D y creativos de todas las edades y niveles que buscan diferenciarse, ganar visibilidad y cerrar oportunidades en el mercado global.


Metodología de Aprendizaje:
Recuerda que este curso incluye lecciones en vídeo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artículos didácticos, actividades, animaciones, ilustraciones, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interés, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalización, tutorización online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicación del curso.
La modalidad de este curso te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tú quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase según tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos... Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al máximo la formación, pero también puedes decidir ver este curso como una guía de referencia.
Las clases están claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten más importantes según tus necesidades formativas. La mayoría de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lección sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para seguir el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El curso está orientado a aquellos creativos que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer múltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano de los instructores Álvaro García y Lucía Fernández. Además la formación disponen de acceso automático al contenido, sin limitación de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al día los 7 días de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantía de devolución.
Con esta formación disfrutarás aprendiendo desde dónde quieras, sin tener que desplazarte, sin horarios, con quién quieras, según tus necesidades y disponibilidad. Aprenderás con un instructor avalado por miles da alumnos satisfechos en todo el mundo (comentarios certificados). Conocerás las técnicas, métodos, trucos y flujos de trabajo de este sector creativo. El docente te transmitirá su sabiduría y conocimientos con pasión a la vez que las explicaciones concisas, claras, sencillas y con un enfoque profesional en cada clase. Podrás conseguir un  certificado homologado personalizado y firmado por tu instructor en cada formación. De está forma podrás compartir tu título en tu portafolio, currículo, en redes sociales...
Con la alta definición de los vídeos (vídeo fullHD y audio de estudio) conseguirá no te perder detalle. Podrás ver las clases las veces que requieras para recordar y perfeccionar tus habilidades como diseñador. Tendrás la posibilidad de preguntar, pedir opinión y ayuda al instructor, además de compartir tu experiencia de aprendizaje con los demás alumnos del curso, tan apasionados como tú, repartidos por todo el mundo. Seleccionamos cuidadosamente los contenidos y producimos cada curso para garantizar una experiencia de aprendizaje online integral y de la máxima calidad.


¿A qué esperas?, este curso es ideal para ti, atrévete a convertirte en un experto y expresa tus ideas de la forma que siempre has deseado. Adelante, nos vemos dentro de la formación ;)
target_audience: Estudiantes de arquitectura e interiorismo que necesitan un CV + PortFolio profesional para destacar, conseguir entrevistas y primeros clientes.

courses.title: How To Conduct An Online Brand Audit
courses.bio: Evaluate Brand Performance: Assess Your Brand's Digital Presence & Positioning To Design Better Brand Strategies
objectives: Evaluate your brand's online presence for strengths and weaknesses
Conduct an online reputation audit to uncover your brand's public image and perceptions
Build a results-driven brand strategy
Conduct an SEO Audit
Uncover your business's accurate positioning in the minds of your customers
Design an Online Integrated Marketing Communication Plan
Conduct a brand competitive analysis for your industry
Evaluate your brand perception

Laying the Foundations: Case Study: A Tale of 2 Brands
Online Brand Audits: The What, How & Why?
Evaluation of Online Assets: Things To Always Look Out For When Evaluating Online Assets
Online Reputation Audit: Components Of An Online Reputation Audit
Bonus Lecture: When To Use AI In An Onli: When To Use AI In An Online Brand Audit

requirements: Have a basic understanding of marketing principles and terms
courses.description:
We’re currently past the phase of debating whether or not building brands is important. It’s been proven time and time again that a strong brand impacts customer purchase decisions therefore impacting a business’s bottom line.
The Challenge
What happens after a brand has been thoughtfully created and established?
How are you evaluating your brand’s performance?
How is your brand being perceived by the public?
How is it doing in the eyes of your customers?
How are you managing and tracking your brand’s reputation?
Think about the cases where a lot of budget has been allocated to crafting the perfect brand visual identity, messaging or compelling brand campaign but a company will still have negative associations tied to it.
Or the cases where your company is doing multiple brand marketing initiatives but you’re not sure which levers are driving results and which ones are causing you to lose out on significant market share.
The Path Forward
If you want a clear pulse on how your brand is performing and being perceived - so you can strategize more effectively - this course is for you.
A Brand Audit provides clarity on exactly how your brand is doing; what’s broken, inconsistent or confusing customers in addition to providing clarity on what is resonating with prospects and helping you get ahead of competitors.
Most other courses offered on the Udemy platform cover the work that needs to be done to build a brand from the ground up. This course dives into the stage after your brand has been built and you’re wondering “What's broken? What’s working”
A Brand Audit uncovers your accurate positioning in a market, not the positioning you and your team outlined for the business, we're talking about where the target audience actually ranks you in their heads --and see if that’s aligned with your team’s internal vision
A well conducted Brand Audit lets you know if the perceptions of your brand are negative or positive and provides context into why, letting you know what needs to be fixed or what you need to double down on.
Your instructor on this course, Dana Mando, is a marketing communications specialist who has managed and audited global brands for over a decade. She will be sharing her knowledge and guiding you through the framework of conducting and online Brand Audit in today's competitive landscape.
So much goes into forming a brand’s reputation, image and perception, while a lot of it is driven by a company's own marketing efforts, MUCH of a brand’s image is informed by external forces. Things like conversations happening on online channels your brand doesn’t own. Like a thread on Reddit discussing the pros and cons of a specific company. Or a negative review of a company written within a blog. These are all things that can actively make or break your prospect’s perception of your business.
A brand audit takes all this into account.
A lot of the work you put into brand marketing can feel elusive and Initiatives can have vague results. Band audits are practical, checklist driven, logical and most importantly trackable. In this course you’ll get access to structured tools and templates that inform a sound brand strategy.

The course follows the below framework of building an Online Brand Audit:
Business Overview & Alignment
This first crucial step involves level-setting to identify the business's current priorities, goals and any micro/macro factors impacting the business as a whole. Most importantly this step concludes with mapping out your Brand Audit's objectives to ensure the rest of the framework has clear direction.

Evaluation Of Online Assets
Here you'll be evaluating your brand’s owned online channels for strengths and weaknesses to see how your controlled online brand presence is coming across to your customers. You will learn all the ways you are either helping or damaging your brand image.

Online Reputation Audit
Here you'll be uncovering your brand's accurate reputation and perceptions among your target audience and the public, this step includes the following key sections:
SEO Audit:
Here your brand's SEO strength will be put to the test with a search engine ranking analysis in addition to an assessment of your company's SEO efforts.
Online Mentions:
Quantitative and qualitative data that uncovers your brand's true reputation and image. You will learn first hand how your target audience speaks about your brand online and identify what's shaping your brand's reputation.
Web Analytics:
Here we'll be analyzing the metrics that keep your online business alive. In this evaluation you will diagnose and identify what is either confusing your customers or what is increasing engagement through looking at key website metrics. We'll be looking specifically at: traffic, bounce rate, page views and conversion rates.

Competitive Analysis
In this section you'll be identifying the context and industry your brand is operating in, you'll learn everything from top industry trends and projections to who the top players are in your market. Most importantly you'll be identifying your business's direct competitors and how well your brand is ranked against them using a brand perceptual map. This step is broken down to the following sections:
Defining Your industry
Industry Overview
List Of Competitors
Perceptual Map

Brand Strategy & Tactics
You’ll be developing a concluding brand strategy and integrated online marketing communication plan using all the findings you gathered from your audit. The beauty of this plan is it’s based on precise gaps and opportunities that were made clear through the audit, putting you in the perfect position to strategize.


Live Case study:
Throughout this course your instructor will be building an online brand audit from scratch, using a live case study of a well known Saas company, putting all the theory in the framework into action.


Enroll now to start building your own Online Brand Audit & Strategy to get closer not only to your brand goals but to your business goals too!
target_audience: Marketing professionals in any capacity
Both brand marketing professionals & beginners in brand marketing can benefit from this course
Small business owners
Anyone prioritizing brand strategy and optimization

courses.bio: Build a brand like no other. Stand out, attract customers, and grow your business
objectives: Define Your Brand Purpose: Clarify what makes your business unique and how to communicate that to your audience.
Develop Your Brand Story: Learn to develop a narrative that resonates and connects with your customers.
Create a Visual Identity: Build a cohesive look and feel that represents your brand across all platforms.
Build Consistency: Establish a strong foundation that makes everything—from social media posts to business growth—easier and more effective.

Build: Audience, Value Proposition, and Brand Promise
Bringing Your Brand to Life Visually

requirements: No experience needed. You will learn everything you need to know.
courses.description:
Your brand is the foundation of your business—just like a solid base is key to building a house. When your brand is clear, consistent, and aligned with who you are, everything else—your website, your messaging, your marketing—becomes easier and more effective.
Brand Foundations is a step-by-step branding course for entrepreneurs, marketers, and small business owners who want to grow their business with clarity and confidence.
Inside, you’ll learn how to build a brand strategy that feels aligned and drives results. You’ll define your purpose, clarify your brand message, understand your audience, and create a consistent visual identity that reflects your values and connects with the people you want to reach.
Whether you’re just starting out or refreshing your brand, this course gives you the practical tools you need to stand out in your market, attract the right clients, and grow your business.
It’s clear, accessible, and broken into short, manageable lessons—no jargon, no overwhelm, just a solid brand foundation that supports your growth.
By the end of this course, you’ll have a complete, usable brand strategy you can confidently apply across your website, social media, and marketing—so your business not only looks good but works better.
Let’s build a brand that’s true to you and drives growth.

courses.description:
Branding con Inteligencia Artificial – Crea y gestiona marcas con ChatGPT, Firefly y Copilot
¿Quieres aprender a crear y gestionar una marca de forma más rápida, creativa y profesional?
En este curso descubrirás cómo combinar la gestión de marca (Brand Management) con el poder de la Inteligencia Artificial Generativa para diseñar, lanzar y hacer crecer una marca en la era digital.
Aprenderás paso a paso a usar herramientas como ChatGPT, Adobe Firefly, MidJourney y Microsoft Copilot Studio para construir la identidad de una marca, su narrativa, su estilo visual y su comunicación en redes sociales.
Lo que aprenderás
Los fundamentos del Brand Management en la era digital.
Cómo usar ChatGPT para estrategia de marca, naming y storytelling.
Cómo diseñar logos, moodboards y estilos visuales con Firefly, DALL·E y MidJourney.
Cómo automatizar campañas y crear contenido para redes sociales con IA.
Cómo construir tu propio asistente de marca con Microsoft Copilot Studio.
Los principales retos y consideraciones éticas: copyright, autenticidad y coherencia de marca.
Un proyecto final práctico: crearás una marca completa desde cero usando IA generativa.
¿A quién está dirigido este curso?
Emprendedores y startups que quieren crear su marca de forma rápida y profesional.
Profesionales de marketing y branding que buscan integrar IA en su flujo de trabajo.
Diseñadores y creativos que desean explorar herramientas de IA para identidad de marca.
Estudiantes y freelancers interesados en el futuro del branding y el marketing digital.
Herramientas que utilizarás
ChatGPT → estrategia de marca, naming y storytelling
Adobe Firefly / DALL·E → logos, identidad visual y conceptos de diseño
MidJourney → moodboards e inspiración creativa
Microsoft Copilot Studio → creación de asistentes de marca personalizados
target_audience: Personas interesadas en el branding moderno y la innovación tecnológica.
Profesionales de marketing, diseño, comunicación o emprendimiento.
Estudiantes o curiosos que quieran explorar el uso de la inteligencia artificial en la construcción de marcas.

courses.description:
ハイレベルクライアントの獲得から高額商品の販売まで、体系的に学べる実践講座です。顧客の成長に合わせたペルソナ設計から、優良顧客を惹きつけるコンテンツ作成、高単価商品の効果的な販売手法まで、現場で使える実践的なスキルを網羅。


特に、理想の見込み客が持つ根源的欲求の特定方法や、ハイレベル層に響くコンテンツの設計手法、信頼関係を構築するコミュニケーション技術など、成果を出すために必要な知識を詳しく解説します。


初心者でも安心して学べる丁寧な解説と、実例を交えた具体的なノウハウで、確実なスキルアップを実現します。高額商品への移行戦略から、ハイレベルビジネスに必要なマインドセット、優良顧客を中心とした持続可能なビジネスモデルの構築まで、実践的なテクニックを学ぶことができます。


ビジネスを次のステージに進めたい方はもちろん、収益性の向上を目指す事業者の方にもおすすめです。段階的な学習カリキュラムにより、ハイエンドマーケティングの基礎知識から実践的な販売手法まで、体系的に習得できます。

courses.description:
A warm welcome to the The Ultimate LinkedIn Guide for Professionals & Freelancers course by Uplatz.


LinkedIn is the world's largest professional networking platform. It's like Facebook, but for your career. Think of it as an online resume that's always up-to-date and accessible to recruiters, potential clients, and colleagues.
By investing time in creating a strong LinkedIn profile and engaging with the platform, you can unlock its full potential for career and business success.


How LinkedIn Works
Create a Profile: You build a profile showcasing your work experience, skills, education, and interests.
Connect with Others: You connect with colleagues, classmates, and other professionals in your field.
Share and Engage: You can share articles, posts, and updates to stay top-of-mind and participate in industry conversations.
Discover Opportunities: LinkedIn helps you find jobs, connect with recruiters, learn new skills, and even generate leads for your business.


Key Offerings by LinkedIn
Networking: Connect with millions of professionals worldwide.
Job Searching: Find jobs and get noticed by recruiters.
Learning: Access LinkedIn Learning courses to develop in-demand skills.
Content Marketing: Share your expertise and build your brand.
Lead Generation: Find and connect with potential clients.
Sales Navigator: A premium tool for advanced lead generation and sales prospecting.


Building an Impactful Profile
Professional Photo: Use a high-quality headshot.
Compelling Headline: Summarize your expertise and value proposition.
Detailed "About" Section: Tell your professional story and highlight your key skills.
Showcase Experience: List your work history with quantifiable achievements.
Gather Recommendations: Request recommendations from colleagues and clients.
Share Engaging Content: Post regularly to stay top-of-mind and showcase your expertise.


Benefits of a Strong LinkedIn Profile
Increased Visibility: Get found by recruiters and potential clients.
Career Advancement: Discover new job opportunities and advance your career.
Professional Networking: Build relationships with industry leaders.
Brand Building: Establish yourself as an expert in your field.
Business Growth: Generate leads and attract new clients.
Learning and Development: Stay updated on industry trends and acquire new skills.


LinkedIn offers a wealth of benefits for both professionals and freelancers. Here's how both groups can leverage the platform:
1. Benefits for Professionals
Enhanced Visibility: A strong profile increases your visibility to recruiters, hiring managers, and potential employers.
Career Advancement: Discover new job opportunities, explore different career paths, and connect with companies you admire.
Networking Opportunities: Expand your professional network by connecting with colleagues, industry leaders, and potential mentors.
Skill Development: Access LinkedIn Learning to acquire new skills and stay updated on industry trends.
Industry Insights: Follow thought leaders, join groups, and participate in discussions to stay informed about your field.
Brand Building: Share your expertise and insights through posts and articles to establish yourself as a thought leader.
2. Benefits for Freelancers
Client Acquisition: Connect with potential clients, showcase your portfolio, and generate leads for your freelance business.
Brand Building: Establish your freelance brand and highlight your expertise to attract clients.
Networking: Connect with other freelancers, potential collaborators, and industry professionals.
Skill Development: Stay updated on industry trends and acquire new skills relevant to your freelance work.
Community Building: Join groups and participate in discussions to connect with other freelancers and learn from their experiences.
Marketing and Promotion: Use LinkedIn to promote your services, share your work, and attract new clients.


The Ultimate LinkedIn Guide for Professionals & Freelancers - Course Curriculum
Module 1:

courses.title: Creating a Successful Beauty Brand: Marketing and Branding
courses.bio: Marketing and branding strategies for successfully selling cosmetics, hair care, personal care & beauty products
objectives: If you're a budding beauty entrepreneur, you will learn how to identify your brand's core value(s) and communicate that effectively to customers near and far. You will also become familiar with who your "ideal" customer is and how to get their attention across multiple online (and offline) channels.

Marketing Analytics: Analyzing Marketing Channel Part 1: Social Media
Analyzing Marketing Channel Part 3: Email Marketing

requirements: No.  This course is open to all.
courses.description:
How did Kylie Cosmetics, Fenty, and myriad other beauty brands find success in the competitive beauty space?  Well, to put it simply...they had excellent marketing plans.  In this course, we will be covering all the necessary basics of creating and conceptualizing your beauty brand and then marketing your product to the right customer (at the right time).  Brought to your by Alchemist Express, a leading consulting firm and marketplace for the development of excellent personal care, cosmetics and other beauty products, this course reviews all the essentials from identifying your beauty brand niche, identifying and targeting your ideal customer base, creating your brand story to finally marketing across various online and offline platforms for maximum effectiveness.
In a nutshell, you should take this course if you....
Are starting, or have just started your beauty brand.
Are looking to expand revenue opportunities for your beauty salon business through beauty brand sales.
Are interested in marketing your handmade beauty product on social media, email lists, forums, etc.
Are simply interested in the marketing methods of beauty brand marketing professionals.
Want to take those first crucial steps toward entrepreneurship and being your own boss.
Each section of this course has worksheets, useful links and additional resources to assist you in this brand building journey. By the end of this course, you should have a very strong conceptual framework for beauty brand marketing success.
target_audience: This course is for all those who are interested in developing a beauty brand, finding an effective and interested niche market and ultimately marketing to that niche in the best possible way.

courses.description:
SNSの「いいね」やフォロワーだけではビジネスは成長しない。
この講座では、AIを活用したメルマガ集客のノウハウを学び、読者の心をつかむ文章術を習得します。
「メルマガに興味はあるけど、何を書けばいいのかわからない」「続けるのが難しい」「反応がない」といった悩みを、AIを活用することでスムーズに解決。初心者でも簡単に実践できるテンプレートや実演を交えながら、効果的なライティング・読者との関係を深める方法を具体的に解説します。
特に、ChatGPTを活用した自動ライティング技術を身につければ、文章作成の負担を大幅に減らしつつ、読者が「次も読みたい！」と思うメルマガを作れるようになります。
SNSだけに頼らず、「読まれる」「信頼される」「行動につながる」メルマガを作成し、長期的なファンとのつながりを築くスキルを身につけましょう。

研究によると「80％の人が、商品の中身ではなく　見かけで選ぶ」そう


人間はいかに購買行動に結びつくのか？
という脳の認知機能を研究したものを、行動経済学といいます


脳は感情を司ります
感情は、デザイン次第で一喜一憂します
感情が動くことで、人間は買い行動に移ります


ということは？
人間の購買心理を知ったうえで、ブランディングすることが重要だということ！
『感情をゆさぶる＝売れる』


ただこのポイントを知るだけで、
ターゲットに、より伝わる・心を動かす・選ばれることができるはず・・

courses.title: The Branding Principles of Iconic Fashion and Luxury Brands
courses.bio: Learn how to create a magnetic brand story by applying the principals of branding to luxury products
objectives: How to establish your Brand elements
How to create an effective Brand story
Luxury market branding strategies
Creating an emotional connection with your clients
Understand the specificity of a Brand in Luxury
requirements: No experience required
courses.description:
This course is designed for those who want to learn how to create a magnetic brand story. You'll learn the principals of branding for a luxury brand, including how to make your product stand out from the crowd and how to create a memorable experience for your clients.
This is not just any old marketing course—it's specifically tailored for those who want to make their mark on the world as a luxury brand. Brand elements are the keys to awareness and recognition. These are the most valuable tools to identify your Brand and differentiate it from its competitors. Learn about the branding strategy of Luxury Brands, what makes them different from one another, and why certain brands are more successful than others.
It's not as simple as creating a fancy logo and calling it a day. If you want to make it in the luxury market, there's a lot more that goes into it than just putting together an aesthetically pleasing lookbook. Luxury brands—particularly those that are well-established—have a story to tell, and that story is what sets them apart from their competitors.
The course will teach you how to create a strong message that resonates with consumers and helps them understand what makes your product so special. You'll also learn about creating an emotional connection between your customer and their experience with your products or services, which is essential if you want them coming back again and again!
In this course, you will learn:
- How to establish your Brand elements
- How to create an effective Brand story
- Luxury market branding strategies
Following the entire course will grant you LMA (Luxury Marketing Academy based in Paris) Certification at the end.
target_audience: All levels

courses.description:
Youtube 크리에이터 첫걸음!
Youtube 마스터 클래스에서 고품질 영상, 조회수, 구독자 모두 갖추기!


인기 있는 YouTube 채널을 만들고 싶어서 이 강의를 찾아오셨죠?


YouTube를 처음 접하는 분일 수도 있고, 경험은 있지만 기존 채널을 성장시키는 데 도움이 필요한 분일 수도 있습니다.
YouTube는 스스로를 브랜드로 성장시키고, 웹사이트로 트래픽을 유도하고, 광고와 제품 및 서비스 프로모션을 통해 돈을 벌 수 있는 완벽한 장소입니다. 그리고 이것은 여러분이 YouTube 채널을 시작할 수 있는 완벽한 강의입니다.


만약, 여러분이 자신의 브랜드를 성장시키기를 원한다면, 더 많은 조회수와 구독자를 얻기를 원한다면, 처음부터 채널을 만들기를 원한다면, 이 강의는 여러분이 원하는 것을 얻을 수 있는 완벽한 강의입니다.
YouTube 채널을 시작하고자 하는 동기가 무엇이든, 여러분은 완벽한 강의를 찾아내신 것입니다.


YouTube 마스터클래스는 그 어떤 강의보다도 포괄적인 내용을 담고 있습니다. 인터넷에서 만나볼 수 있는 그 어떤 강의보다도 실제로 따라할 수 있는 내용으로 가득 찬, YouTube 채널을 강화할 수 있는 강의로, 만약 효과가 없다면 환불을 받으실 수 있습니다.
이 강의는 수천 명의 구독자와 수천 회의 조회수를 확보하고 궁극적으로 수입을 창출할 수 있는 전문적인 영상을 만들 수 있는, 이를 위해 필요한 모든 것을 갖춘 유일한 강의입니다!


YouTube 마스터클래스는 아무런 기술도 없는 상태에서 고품질의 영상, 조회수, 구독자를 갖춘 완벽한 YouTube 채널로 안내하는 빠르고 효과적인 과정입니다.
YouTube 채널 구축을 구체적인 측면에 초점을 맞춘 YouTube 관련 강의는 많지만, 초보자나 시청자를 빠르게 늘려야 하는 사람이라면 누구나 수강할 수 있는, 이 강의와 같은 종합적인 강의는 찾기 어렵죠.
이 강의는 YouTube 채널로 영상을 만들고 있는(또는 영상을 만들고 싶은) 모든 사람을 위해 마련된 것입니다. 만약, 완전히 경험이 없으시거나 도움이 필요한 채널을 보유하고 있다면, 완벽한 강의를 찾아내신 것입니다.


이 강의를 수강한 후에 무엇을 할 수 있게 될까요?
아무것도 없는 상태에서 채널 시작하기
구독자 없는 상태에서 조회수 얻기
시청자를 구독자로 바꾸기
예산에 맞춰 영상 만들기
YouTube 플랫폼 탐색하기
YouTube 파트너 되기
영상 올리기 및 멋진 제목, 설명, 태그, 썸네일로 영상 최적화하기
YouTube 영상으로 브랜드 성장시키기
애널리틱스로 채널 개선하기
YouTube 영상으로 돈 벌기(광고, 제품, 서비스, 스폰서, 크라우드 펀딩)
YouTube 채널 개설과 성장에 베스트 프랙티스 사용하기


YouTube 채널 성장으로 더 많은 조회수, 구독자 얻고 더 많은 수익 창출하기
여러분의 경험 수준, 사용하는 카메라의 종류와 관계없이, 이 심화 강의는 성공적인 YouTube 채널을 시작하는 데 필요한 모든 것을 제공하도록 고안되었습니다.
YouTube 채널을 성공적으로 만드는 방법을 이해하면, 비즈니스를 홍보하기 위한 채널이든, 기술을 가르치든, Vlog로 자신의 경험을 공유하든, YouTube 채널을 성공적으로 만드는 것을 이해하고, 더 많은 조회수를 얻고, 더 많은 구독자를 모아 수익을 창출할 수 있습니다. 이 강의에서는 무엇을 정확하게 어떻게 해야 하는지를 설명합니다.


콘텐츠와 개요
이 강의는 신규 YouTube에게 훌륭한 영상을 만들고, 수익을 창출하기 위해 필요한 것을 가르칩니다. 대부분의 수업 내용은 성공을 위해 필요한 가치뿐만 아니라, 성공하는 방법을 정확하게 보여주는 실습 튜토리얼입니다.
여러분은 모든 유튜버를 위한 모범 사례를 통해 기본적인 사항부터 시작합니다. 이 팁을 통해 여러분이 유튜버로서의 마음 가짐이 어떤 것인지를 배울 수 있게 됩니다.
또한, YouTube 플랫폼의 사용법을 배우시게 됩니다. 계정을 등록하고 YouTube 파트너 인증을 받고, Creator Studio를 탐색하는 방법을 알 수 있습니다.
이후, 전문적이고 저렴한 장비를 통해 멋진 영상을 만드는 방법을 배울 수 있습니다. 카메라로 멋진 영상을 촬영하고, 오디오를 훌륭하게 녹음하고, 저렴한 DIY 설정을 통해 영상에 필요한 조명을 설정하는 방법, 영상을 효율적으로 편집하는 방법을 배울 수 있습니다.
멋지 영상 제작법을 배우면 SEO에 친숙한 조회수를 얻을 수 있는 제목, 설명, 태그를 통해 YouTube 채널에 영상 게시 방법을 배울 수 있습니다. 보기를 향상시키는 사용자 지정 썸네일을 디자인하고 업로드하는 방법도 배울 수 있죠. 조회수와 구독자를 높일 수 있는 다양한 최적화 전략도 확인하실 수 있습니다.
애널리틱스 활용법을 배우면, 어떤 영상이 효과가 좋고, 어떤 영상이 그렇지 않은지를 알 수 있습니다. 이를 통해 스마트한 영상 제작으로 YouTube 채널을 바르게 성장시킬 수 있으며, 효과가 있는 영상을 골라 제작할 수 있습니다.
마지막으로 YouTube에서 광고, YouTube Premium , 디지털 및 물리적인 상품, 스폰서, 크라우드 펀딩 등을 통해수익을 창출하는 방법을 배울 수 있습니다.
이 강의가 끝날 때 쯤이면, 여러분은 스스로 자부심을 가질 수 있는 YouTube 채널을 갖게 될 것입니다. 시청자들이 좋아하는 고품질의 영상을 만들 수 있고, 브랜드 파워를 높이기 위해 더 많은 구독자를 확보할 수 있습니다. 또한, 이를 통해 수익을 창출할 수 있게 될 것입니다.


강사 소개
필 에비너. 필은 2012년부터 온라인 강의를 가르쳤으며, 11만 명 이상의 Udemy수강생이 필이 알려주는 사진기술과 영상 편집 등 다양한 강의에 만족했습니다. 필은 2013년부터 YouTube 채널을 개설하여 자신만의 브랜드를 구축했으며, 성공을 위한 자신의 지식을 기쁘게 공유합니다.
마이크 모이어와 로렌 모이어. 마이크와 로렌은 성공적인 유튜버로, 개인 재정, 조기 은퇴, DIY 프로젝트 등 다양한 영상을 업로드하여 생활을 이어가고 있습니다. 이들은 YouTube 채널을 빠르게 성장시켰고, 매일 수천 회의 조회수를 기록합니다. 마이크와 로렌은 성공적인 YouTube 채널의 완벽한 본보기이며, 여러분이 자신만의 채널을 시작하는 데 도움을 줄 수 있기를 기대합니다.
이 강의는 30일 내 100% 환불이 보장됩니다. 바로 지금 이 강의를 수강하고 이를 따라하는 데 여러분을 방해할 것은 아무것도 없습니다.


강의를 들으시고 강의와 관련하여 궁금하신 점은 무엇이든 Q&A에 남기실 수 있지만, 꼭 영어로 남겨주세요. 그래야 답변을 드릴 수 있습니다. :)


지금 바로 등록하기 버튼을 클릭하세요. 첫 번째 수업에서 뵙겠습니다!
여러분을 응원합니다.
Phil Ebiner 드림
target_audience: 채널 성장, 조회수, 구독자를 늘리고 수익을 내는 데 어려움을 겪는 유튜버

courses.description:
Welcome to the Ultimate Branding Course.
So, what is branding?


Branding is not your logo,
it’s not your website,
it’s not your colours,
it’s not your ads.


Branding is everything else, it’s the feeling people get when they think of you, it’s what they say about you when you’re not in the room, it’s the difference between a business and a brand.


Branding is how you show up, it’s your tone, your packaging, your service, it’s the customer support call, the way you write emails, the way your product feels in their hand.
This course is not about theory, it’s not a lecture, it’s a workshop, it’s a mirror, it forces you to ask hard questions about what you’re building and how people actually see you.
No buzzwords, no fluff, no corporate marketing speak, just branding that works, branding that sticks, branding that sells.


Why branding matters more than ever.
You can pay for attention, you can’t pay for trust.
Marketing brings clicks, branding brings customers back.
Great marketing gets you seen, great branding makes them care.
When trust is low, costs go up, CPM goes up, CPC goes up, conversion drops, people don’t trust what looks fake.
When trust is high, you win, people recommend you, people wait for restocks, people forgive your mistakes.
And that is branding.
Branding is not a one-time project, it’s not a launch-day decision, it’s everything, always.
Every interaction is branding, every word, every reply, every design choice, every delay or refund. People don’t judge you on what you say, they judge you on how you make them feel.


What you’ll learn
What branding is and isn’t,
the seven essential elements of a brand that sells,
how branding works with marketing and when they clash,
why perception matters more than your product,
how to define your brand’s mission, purpose and tone,
how to write taglines that make people feel something,
why colours aren’t just visual, they’re emotional, how to make your customers remember you with no words,
how to build a brand experience across every touchpoint,
how to measure your brand perception using NPS, feedback and sentiment, the psychology behind customer loyalty and emotional branding,
real case studies of bad branding like Temu and Wish,
what mistakes to avoid when launching or relaunching a brand,
how to stay consistent across platforms without sounding robotic,
how to build a brand people would miss if you disappeared.


Who this is for
This course is for people who are tired of copying,
tired of looking like every other business,
tired of wasting money on ads that don’t convert,
tired of marketing products no one talks about.
It’s for founders who want to be remembered,
for freelancers building a name,
for marketers tired of fixing broken brands,
for creators building something that matters.
This is not about degrees, this is about attention,
this is about trust,
this is about showing up every day the same way, consistently and honestly.




What makes this course different
There are thousands of branding courses, most are theory-heavy and real-world light, this one is different.
We built this for doers, people building brands while still figuring it out, people running businesses not marketing teams.
This course skips the fluff, it’s hands-on, simple and powerful, you’ll leave with your brand written out, not just thought out.
We don’t care about pretty presentations, we care if your brand works.


How you’ll learn
No bloated lectures, sharp practical videos,
templates and worksheets to fill in as you go,
real case studies including Nike, Netflix, Fenty, Temu and Dunkin,
action steps after each module,
clear jargon-free examples that make sense even if you’ve never worked in marketing.
You’ll go from thinking you know what your brand is to knowing exactly what you stand for,
how you show up and why people will remember you.


Still wondering if branding is worth it
Think of your favourite brand, now ask yourself, why do I trust them, why do I buy from them, why do I recommend them.
That feeling is branding.
It’s not a logo, it’s not a slogan, it’s a connection, it’s trust built over time.
Now imagine your customers feel that way about you, that’s what this course helps you build.


This course is your roadmap, to go from invisible to unforgettable, to build a brand that grows without begging for clicks, to earn trust not just attention, to build something people remember even when you stop marketing.


Let’s get started.

How do the most loved brands stand out? What keeps their customers queuing up outside their store? What makes people come back over and over again? Brands can be complex and building your own from scratch can be tough, however there is a playbook that the most successful brands in the world adhere to and you can learn that in this course. Building a brand that your customers will love is critical for long term success and stability. In this course we take you through several case studies where we look at how some of the worlds best brands do it. We help you understand how to understand and engage your audience in the most impactful and revenue driving way. Our courses empower Fashion Creatives to generate more income and scale through Marketing, Brand Strategy, Web & E-Commerce learning.
